We’re confident you’ll find a design here that sparks your creativity.</p> \n<h4 style=\"font-size: 22px;\"><strong>Read More:</strong><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/website-design-homepage-examples?hubs_post-cta=header\" style=\"font-style: normal;\"> 77 Examples of Incredible Website Design</a></h4> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/website-design-homepage-examples?hubs_post-cta=header&amp;_ga=2.71015760.191708588.1644020930-550792540.1644020930\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/website-ebook-cover%20copy-jpg.jpeg?width=210&amp;name=website-ebook-cover%20copy-jpg.jpeg\" width=\"210\" style=\"width: 210px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" alt=\"77 Examples of Incredible Website Design\" /></a></p> \n<a></a> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><em><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/website-design-homepage-examples?hubs_post-cta=imagebottom\">Download this free guide</a></em><em> to see even more examples of website blog, homepage, and landing page designs. </em></p> \n<h2>Beautiful Award-Winning Websites</h2> \n<h3>Best Website Designs from 2021</h3> \n<h4>IBM’s The Harmonic State</h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Month (July 2021), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>When you land on this IBM web page, it’s clear to see why the design won an award.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"best website designs from 2021: IBM\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-39-56-AM.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-39-56-AM.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center; font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"https://www.ibm.com/resources/activations/harmonic-state\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p>The best way to describe the website is as an immersive experience. In fact, IBM uses both visual and auditory elements to draw the visitor in and keep them engaged.</p> \n<p>When you first land on the web page, you’re prompted to put on headphones to get the full experience. Even if you skip this step, you’re drawn in by the interactive background that reacts as your mouse navigates on the page.</p> \n<p>In addition, the page is well balanced with a large title that grabs your attention across from a small description with a bold blue CTA.</p> \n<p>With a topic as complex as AI, IBM then uses visual storytelling to explain how its Watson tool works in the real world. Visitors can explore three stories through video game-like functions and learn more about the tool.</p> \n<p>It’s a fun and effective way to get users engaged in a topic that can be complicated and dry.</p> \n<h4>Superlist</h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Month (April 2021), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>Superlist is a productivity app that helps teams and individuals change the way they work.</p> \n<p>Too often, you land on a website and have to figure out what the brand is about. With Superlist, you know exactly what to expect as soon as you get to the homepage.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"best website designs from 2021: superlist\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-41-94-AM.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-41-94-AM.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"https://superlist.com/\">Image Source</a></span></p> \n<p>The interactive homepage shows common work accessories, like headphones and keyboard with clear, to-the-point copy.</p> \n<p>Superlist effectively uses white space to keep the focus on its copy. However, to facilitate navigation, they include a small button with an arrow icon to indicate that there’s more to see on the page once you scroll.</p> \n<p>From there, the fun visuals continue – keeping you engaged as you learn more about the brand.</p> \n<h4><a href=\"https://www.flyhyer.com/\">Hyer</a></h4> \n<h5>Award: Website of the Month (2022), CSS Design Awards</h5> \n<p>Want to make a strong impression on your website visitors? Take a page out of Hyer’s book.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/best%20website%20design%20of%202021%20hyer-jpg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=best%20website%20design%20of%202021%20hyer-jpg.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"best website designs from 2021: hyer\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center; font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"https://www.flyhyer.com/\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p>This striking illustration of the airplane, as it slowly moves across the screen, is sure to grab website visitors’ attention.</p> \n<a></a> \n<p>This page has everything you need in an effective homepage: An image that tells a story but isn’t too distracting, use of white space, easy nav bar, a tagline or slogan, and a clear CTA.</p> \n<p>It’s a clean design that’s free of any distractions and invites visitors to learn more about the brand.</p> \n<h3>Best Website Designs from 2020</h3> \n<h4><strong>Swab the World</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Day (2020), Awwwards</h5> \n<p><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/website/parallax-scrolling\">Parallax</a>, bold colors, and negative space shape the design and experience of<a href=\"https://swabtheworld.com/en/\"> </a><a href=\"https://swabtheworld.com/en/\">Swab the World’s</a> website. The organization brings awareness to stem cell donations. Their mission is to “Make sure every single patient finds their match. Period.” Photos of couples exhibiting love and emotions bring a human element to a historically complex and scientific process.</p> \n<p>From a technical perspective, the design makes moving down the page feel natural, ensuring the readers reach each point of copy and every CTA on the homepage.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/best%20website%20designs%20from%202020-jpg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=best%20website%20designs%20from%202020-jpg.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"best website designs from 2020\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://swabtheworld.com/en/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>Newest Americans</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Honorable Mention (2020), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>An organization with a responsibility as large as honoring past, present, and future migrating identities needs a beautiful and functional website to help spread the word.<a href=\"https://newestamericans.com/\"> </a><a href=\"https://newestamericans.com/\">Newest Americans</a> champion immigrant experiences in cities across the state of New Jersey. The website uses beautiful imagery of people, places, and items that represent this experience in a way that flows cohesively down the homepage, telling the story of this group of America’s newest citizens.</p> \n<p>The website is both visually appealing and functional with a simple navigation menu, stories organized by photos, and a clean press page that puts the most recent articles front and center.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/best%20website%20designs%20from%202020%20newest%20americans-jpg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=best%20website%20designs%20from%202020%20newest%20americans-jpg.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"best website designs from 2020 newest americans\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://newestamericans.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>Spotify Design</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Honorable Mention (2020), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>Spotify is known for accomplishing its fair share of amazing feats, and its latest iteration of<a href=\"https://spotify.design/\"> </a><a href=\"https://spotify.design/\">Spotify.Design</a> is no different. Serving as the hub for all things visual and creative for Spotify, the music and podcast giant gives listeners a look into the who, what, why, and how of what makes the app so sensational.</p> \n<p>Bright colors, drop shadows, and smooth animations give this website character and depth. The flat geometric designs with abstract accents make albums and artists practically jump off of the screen.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/best%20website%20designs%20from%202020%20spotify%20design-jpg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=best%20website%20designs%20from%202020%20spotify%20design-jpg.jpeg\" alt=\"best website designs from 2020 spotify design\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://spotify.design/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>Andy Warhol</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Honorable Mention (2020), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>Artist, film director, and producer Andy Warhol’s life will forever be encapsulated in a<a href=\"http://waaarhol.com/hollywoodblonde-paintings/\"> </a><a href=\"http://waaarhol.com/hollywoodblonde-paintings/\">splendidly designed website</a> that captures his art style in a digital format. As you peruse the page, your cursor becomes a spotlight that converts every image you hover over into a negative image or inverses the colors of the text you’re reading.</p> \n<p>The big, bold text makes a statement and emphasizes just how important copy is to website design. Subtle animations help pace the site and set the tone for each section as you peruse the home page.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/best%20website%20designs%20from%202020%20andy%20warhol-gif.gif?width=600&amp;name=best%20website%20designs%20from%202020%20andy%20warhol-gif.gif\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"best website designs from 2020 andy warhol\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://waaarhol.com/hollywoodblonde-paintings/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>Human Interaction Company</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Corporate Website (2020), Red Dot</h5> \n<p>To see video done right on a website, look no further than the<a href=\"https://www.humaninteraction.com/\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.humaninteraction.com/\">Human Interaction Company</a>. From the moment you click on the site, the experience is lightning fast. You’re dropped directly into the action — the why, what, and how of Human Interaction and exactly what the team does.</p> \n<p>This<a href=\"https://www.red-dot.org/project/human-49228\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.red-dot.org/project/human-49228\">Red Dot Design Award winner</a> aims to bring the study of human interaction to the masses, and in the process, show us just how engaging it can be to learn about it. Don’t get discouraged by their award status though — none of the photos on this site are photoshopped, so it’s a practical example of building quality with the resources you have available.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"human interaction company best website design award winner 2020\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-4.gif?width=624&amp;height=364&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-4.gif\" style=\"margin-left: 0.00px;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" height=\"364\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.humaninteraction.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>Garoa Skincare</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Day (2020), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>How do you transform the feeling of luxury and practicality into a website?<a href=\"https://garoaskincare.com/\"> </a><a href=\"https://garoaskincare.com/\">Garoa Skincare </a>provides a blueprint. Whether your product costs half the price of your closest competitor or twice the price, your site can bring a sense of extravagance to just about any product you sell.</p> \n<p>High-quality visuals, typefaces that complement each other, and a balance of negative space with useful copy can bring a simplistic elegance to your website.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"garoa skincare best website design award winner 2020\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-36-71-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-36-71-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://garoaskincare.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<a></a> \n<h3>Best Website Designs from 2019</h3> \n<h4><strong>1917: In the Trenches</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Awwwards' Best Website of the Day (2019)</h5> \n<p><a href=\"https://intothetrenches.1917.movie/\">This website</a>, made to promote the film 1917, allows you to walk around the trenches and perform the same mission that the characters did in the film. You can also see their maps or access other tools.</p> \n<p>This is a great example of a site that went above and beyond with interactivity as well as a site that leverages its content and prewritten storyline to market its film. This website won Site of the Day by<a href=\"https://www.awwwards.com/\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.awwwards.com/\">Awwwards</a>, which allows designers to vote and nominate great websites they see daily.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"1917: In the trenches best website design award winner 2019\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-36-32-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-36-32-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://intothetrenches.1917.movie/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></strong></h4> \n<h4><strong>The Octopus: A design blog by IDEO</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Business Blog/Website 2019 Webby award</h5> \n<p>IDEO, a global design company, won the Business Blog/Website 2019 Webby award for its<a href=\"https://www.ideo.com/blog\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.ideo.com/blog\">Octopus blog</a>, and for good reason. The blog features a sleek, black-and-white Octopus drawing as its homepage design, and uses yellow, black, and white to create a cohesive theme as you scroll.</p> \n<p>If you hover over a blog post, the title is highlighted in yellow. If you hover over an image, the image is pulled towards you — two small features that make a big difference in terms of creating a unique and engaging user experience.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"The Octopus best website design award winner 2019\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-43-07-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-43-07-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.ideo.com/blog\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>Nomadic Tribe</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Awwwards' Site of the Year nomination (2019)</h5> \n<p>This site, which was nominated for<a href=\"https://annual.awwwards.com/categories/site-of-the-year\"> </a><a href=\"https://annual.awwwards.com/categories/site-of-the-year\">Awwards' Site of the Year</a>, is one of the more engaging sites I've seen.</p> \n<p>The<a href=\"https://nomadictribe.com/\"> </a><a href=\"https://nomadictribe.com/\">homepage</a> immediately begins playing a stunning video featuring a man walking across a desert, followed by gorgeous landscape scenes and text like, \"Are you lucky enough to call yourself an adventurer?\"</p> \n<p>The text throughout the website is playful, with colorful pinks and oranges and yellows, and the homepage is logically designed, with CTAs placed throughout that range in commitment-level from \"Read More\" to \"Watch Now\" and, finally, \"Download the App\".</p> \n<p>Ultimately, the website is beautifully designed with strong attention to detail, and tells a compelling story throughout.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/best%20website%20design%20inspiration%20nomadic%20tribe%20website-jpg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=best%20website%20design%20inspiration%20nomadic%20tribe%20website-jpg.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"website design inspiration nomadic tribe\" /></p> \n<h4 style=\"text-align: center;\"><em><strong><a href=\"https://nomadictribe.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12px;\">Image Source</a></strong></em></h4> \n<h4><strong>Diana Danieli</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Webby 2019</h5> \n<p><a href=\"https://dianadanieli.com/\">This 2019 Webby-winning site</a> shows off imagery of art and architecture with either high contrast or heavy exposure. As a website visitor, you can click and drag your mouse to change the photos and variations. Each image shows a piece of work that highlights the artist who owns the website.</p> \n<p>A cool plus about this website is its incorporation of audio and music. Clicking on certain buttons on the screenplays a piano note and truly immerses you in the Diana Danieli experience.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"website design inspiration \" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-39-85-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-39-85-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://dianadanieli.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>George Nakashima Woodworkers</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Webby 2019</h5> \n<p>This<a href=\"https://nakashimawoodworkers.com/\"> </a><a href=\"https://nakashimawoodworkers.com/\">woodworking website</a> emphasizes nature and care for the woodworking trade. It's essentially a slideshow of beautiful forestry and farming images. As a new image comes on the screen, a new quote related to wood or trees also comes up.</p> \n<p>This is incredibly relaxing to the visitor and shows that the woodworkers recognize the beauty of trees and the environment. This website also<a href=\"https://www.webbyawards.com/winners/2019/websites/general-websites/architecture-design/george-nakashima-woodworkers/\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.webbyawards.com/winners/2019/websites/general-websites/architecture-design/george-nakashima-woodworkers/\">won a Webbie in 2019</a>.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"george nakashima woordworkers best website design award winner 2019\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-35-70-AM.png?width=599&amp;height=326&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-35-70-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"599\" height=\"326\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://nakashimawoodworkers.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<a></a> \n<h3>Best Website Designs from 2018</h3> \n<h4><strong>crypton.trading</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Day (4/3/2018), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>Meet crypton.trading, your robot accountant.</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://crypton.trading/\">Crypton.trading</a> is a trading hub for cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, using artificial intelligence to predict changes in a currency's value and identify key buying and selling opportunities. The website was rated high for its development and design, as it gradually explains more of the developer's methods the further down visitors scroll.</p> \n<p>This award-winning website makes tech-savvy visitors feel right at home the moment Crypton's greeting appears across the homepage, one letter at a time.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"crypton.trading best website design award winner 2018\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-37-50-AM.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-37-50-AM.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\"><a href=\"https://www.awwwards.com/sites/crypton-trading-bot\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></img></p> \n<h4><strong>Southwest: Heart of Travel</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Best Visual Design - Aesthetic, 2018 Webby Awards</h5> \n<p>When Southwest Airlines wanted to prove that its customers were \"more than just a dollar sign,\" the company created a website where the design was assembled using the shapes of their customers' flight paths.</p> \n<p>The website, called Heart of Travel, even allows visitors to create their own artwork out of a trip they might plan on taking. In this way, Southwest's website is a product of their most loyal passengers.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"Southwest best website design award winner 2018\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-35-24-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-35-24-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\"><a href=\"https://www.webbyawards.com/winners/2018/websites/features-design/best-visual-design-aesthetic/heart-of-travel/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></img></p> \n<h4><strong>Overflow</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Day (3/20/2018), Best Website Gallery</h5> \n<p><a href=\"https://overflow.io/\">Overflow</a> is a design tool that allows people and businesses to create story-like flow diagrams of their ideas so they're easier for others to understand. Aside from this being just a good service, the Overflow website practices what it preaches: Along with vibrant red call-to-action buttons for downloading the tool, this website promotes its product the best way it knows how — using a flow diagram.</p> \n<p>The website delivers this flow diagram in the form of a video. While embedded videos can look rather clunky sitting in the middle of a website's other design elements, Overflow's is perfectly placed and exactly what you'd want to see when landing on the site for the first time.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"overflow best website design award winner 2018\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-38-34-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-38-34-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://overflow.io/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>Frans Hals Museum</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Year (2018), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>It can be tough for a museum to present all of its artwork together on a cohesive website. That's what makes the website of the<a href=\"https://www.franshalsmuseum.nl/en/\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.franshalsmuseum.nl/en/\">Frans Hals Museum</a> so impressive.</p> \n<p>Located in the Netherlands, this museum has created a website that uses a combination of digital design elements and its own exhibits. This mixture helps visitors understand what they'll see, when they can see it, and where else they can get a taste of what this museum has to offer.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/website%20design%20inspiration%20frans%20hal%20museum-jpg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=website%20design%20inspiration%20frans%20hal%20museum-jpg.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"website design inspiration frans hal museum\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.franshalsmuseum.nl/en/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<a></a> \n<h3>Best Website Designs from 2017</h3> \n<h4><strong>Simply Chocolate</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Year (2017), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>You'll get a craving for chocolate just looking at this website — and in a way, that's<a href=\"https://simplychocolate.dk/\"> </a><a href=\"https://simplychocolate.dk/\">Simply Chocolate</a>'s website working as designed.</p> \n<p>This appetizing website is that of a Denmark chocolate maker Simply Chocolate. Its website uses a variety of colors (and creative product names) to promote each chocolate bar. And as you scroll from one product to the next, they all seem to remain consistent in brand.</p> \n<p>The three-dimensional appearance of each chocolate bar makes you feel like you can grab it off of your computer screen, while the \"Add to Box\" CTA to the top-left is ideally placed for users to select the products they want while browsing.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Simply Chocolate best website design award winner 2017\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-35-44-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-35-44-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.awwwards.com/sites/simply-chocolate\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>NOWNESS</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Best Cultural Blog/Website, 2017 Webby Awards</h5> \n<p>NOWNESS is perhaps the coolest crowdsourced video blog on the internet. That was a mouthful...what does it all mean?</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.nowness.com/\">NOWNESS</a>' crowdsourcing is part of what makes it an award-winner. This means most of its content comes from independent creatives — an increasingly popular way for businesses to publish content.</p> \n<p>NOWNESS is also a video channel, meaning all of its blog content is in video format. Together, these qualities help make Nowness a captivating hub for the stories that brands everywhere strive to tell.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.webbyawards.com/winners/2017/websites/general-website/cultural-blogwebsite/nowness/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/website%20design%20inspiration%20nowness-jpeg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=website%20design%20inspiration%20nowness-jpeg.jpeg\" alt=\"website design inspiration nowness\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\">Image Source</img></a></p> \n<h3>Best Website Designs from 2016</h3> \n<h4><strong>Rainforest Guardians</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Best Activism Website, 2016 Webby Awards</h5> \n<p><a href=\"http://rainforest.arkivert.no/#kart\">Rainforest Guardians</a> became one of the most immersive nonprofit websites of 2016. Seeking to build awareness around deforestation, the site allows users to \"visit\" the various villages, natives, and waterways that make up the Amazon Rainforest.</p> \n<p>The site puts interactivity at the center of its user experience — a wise choice if your goal is to get people to connect with your cause and convert into volunteers.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/website%20design%20inspiration%20rainforest%20guardians-jpeg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=website%20design%20inspiration%20rainforest%20guardians-jpeg.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"website design inspiration rainforest guardians\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><em><a href=\"https://www.webbyawards.com/winners/2016/websites/general-website/best-activism-websites/rainforest-guardians/\" style=\"font-size: 12px;\">Image Source</a></em></p> \n<a></a> \n<h4><strong>Protest Sportswear</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Year (2016), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>The Awwwards calls<a href=\"https://www.protest.eu/\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.protest.eu/\">Protest Sportswear</a> a \"shoppable lookbook,\" and that's exactly what this site is. As a clothing outfitter, this company has reinvented the way they market its product: Rather than promoting garments of clothing, Protest Sportswear promotes \"looks.\"</p> \n<p>This makes the company's product the most appealing part of the website itself, using a collage of styles to design a homepage that changes as often as its customer's styles do.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/website%20design%20inspiration%20protest%20sportwear-jpg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=website%20design%20inspiration%20protest%20sportwear-jpg.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"website design inspiration protest sportswear\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.awwwards.com/sites/protest-sportswear\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>The Teacher's Guild</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Best Association Website, 2016 Webby Awards</h5> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.teachersguild.org/\">The Teacher's Guild</a> is a professional community of educators that addresses some of the most critical challenges in education. What makes this website award-winning is how it balances diverse content types — programs, solutions, approaches, and collaborations — without overwhelming visitors.</p> \n<p>Not only are the background visuals prominently placed, but they also use white space to emphasize the written calls to action at the center, as shown in the screenshot below.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"Teacher's Guild best website design award winner 2016\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-37-96-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-37-96-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://www.webbyawards.com/winners/2016/websites/general-website/associations/the-teachers-guild/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<a></a> \n<h3>Best Website Designs from 2015 – 2014</h3> \n<h4><strong>Virgin America</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Most Significant Industry Evolution, 2014 UX Awards</h5> \n<p>In a world where airline websites are known to be riddled with major usability issues,<a href=\"https://www.virgin.com/\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.virgin.com/\">Virgin America</a> has one of the best websites that pushes usability, accessibility, and responsive design forward.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"Virgin America UX Award winner 2014\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-39-28-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-39-28-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\"><a href=\"http://userexperienceawards.com/ux-awards-2014-winners/#work-co\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></img></p> \n<h4><strong>Feed</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Day (6/6/2015), Awwwards</h5> \n<p>Not only is<a href=\"http://www.feedmusic.com/\"> </a><a href=\"http://www.feedmusic.com/\">Feed</a> an interesting concept, but it also has a stunning execution that challenges our understanding of what is possible on the web. Through a creative blend of animation and video, the site immerses the user in an engaging experience.</p> \n<p>As an atypical site, it contains several unique usability elements, including navigation that doubles as a scroll progress bar.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://www.awwwards.com/web-design-awards/feed-2\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/website%20design%20inspiration%20feed-jpg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=website%20design%20inspiration%20feed-jpg.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"website design inspiration feed\">Image Source</img></a></p> \n<h4><strong>ETQ</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Day (5/19/2015), Awwwards</h5> \n<p><a href=\"http://www.etq-amsterdam.com/\">ETQ</a> takes a minimalistic approach to ecommerce with a stripped-down site. Big, compelling visuals of their product lay against simple, flat backgrounds accompanied by strong typography that keeps the focus on exactly what the user came there to see: shoes.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"ETQ best website design award winner 2015\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-36-05-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-36-05-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\"><span style=\"font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"http://www.awwwards.com/web-design-awards/etq\" style=\"font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></span></img></p> \n<h4><strong>Mikiya Kobayashi</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Day (7/4/2015), Awwwards</h5> \n<p><a href=\"http://www.mikiyakobayashi.com/\">Mikiya</a> is a Product Designer with a minimalistic portfolio that showcases his work through strong photography and subtle animations. His full site was originally created in Japanese and then translated into English, helping demonstrate the international scalability of his design.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"Mikiya best website design award winner 2015\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-40-16-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-40-16-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\"><a href=\"http://www.awwwards.com/web-design-awards/mikiya-kobayashi\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></img></p> \n<h4><strong>Woven Magazine</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Site of the Day (4/4/2015), Best Website Gallery</h5> \n<p><a href=\"http://wovenmagazine.com/\">Woven</a> is an online publication that celebrates artists, crafters, and creators alike. They confirm that publications can (and should) have beautiful, engaging sites with easy-to-read content. Free of distractions like pop-ups and intrusive ads, this site is all about the experience of the content itself.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/website%20design%20inspiration%20woven-jpg.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=website%20design%20inspiration%20woven-jpg.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"website design inspiration woven\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><a href=\"http://wovenmagazine.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></p> \n<h4><strong>JOHO's Bean</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: FWA of the Day (8/7/2015), Favorite Website Awards</h5> \n<p>The website for JOHO's Bean has incredible imagery, interactivity, storytelling, visual design, and most of all, sound engineering. These all come together to create a compelling, emotional, and engaging site that tells the story of a coffee bean's journey.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-41-26-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-41-26-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\"><a href=\"http://www.thefwa.com/site/follow-the-joho-s-bean\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></img></p> \n<h4><strong>World of SWISS</strong></h4> \n<h5>Award: Best User Interface, 2015 Webby Awards</h5> \n<p>Another airline? Yep.<a href=\"https://www.swiss.com/us/en/homepage\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.swiss.com/us/en/homepage\">SWISS</a> airlines built an incredibly immersive site that tells the story of what it's like to fly with them — and they did too great of a job to be ignored. Strong visuals and animations introduce the user to different sections of the site that are packed with information beyond the usual sales and marketing pitch.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"World of SWISS best website design award winner 2015\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-41-60-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-41-60-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\"><a href=\"http://www.webbyawards.com/winners/2015/websites/website-features-and-design/best-user-interface/world-of-swiss/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></img></p> \n<h3>Other Cool Website Designs</h3> \n<h4>Guillaume Tomasi</h4> \n<p>As a Photographer in Montreal,<a href=\"http://www.guillaumetomasi.com/\"> </a><a href=\"http://www.guillaumetomasi.com/\">Guillaume Tomasi</a> has built a portfolio that's truly fit to house his unique and awe-inspiring photography. His surreal photo style is juxtaposed by his simple, flat, empty, and minimalistic portfolio design that places all of the focus on the work itself.</p> \n<p>His unique series navigation coupled with art-gallery-inspired work introductions and perfect scrolling interactions yield an experience reminiscent of that of a real gallery.<img alt=\"guillaume tomasi best website design award winner\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-34-72-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-34-72-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.guillaumetomasi.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></strong></h3> \n<h4>The District</h4> \n<p>This branding agency takes its imagery seriously, and it should — it handles all channels of media for its clients.<a href=\"https://www.thedistrict.co.uk/\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.thedistrict.co.uk/\">The District's website</a> alone is a journey through some of the most beautiful artwork and photography you've ever seen.</p> \n<p>These provocative tiles change rapidly as you explore the website, and the wackier they seem, the more interested you become in learning about their past work.</p> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/website%20design%20inspiration%20the%20district-png.png?width=600&amp;name=website%20design%20inspiration%20the%20district-png.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" width=\"600\" alt=\"website design inspiration the district\" /></p> \n<h3 style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong><a href=\"https://www.thedistrict.co.uk/\" style=\"font-size: 12px; font-style: normal;\">Image Source</a></strong></h3> \n<h4>Tej Chauhan</h4> \n<p><a href=\"http://tejchauhan.com/\">Tej Chauhan</a> has turned impressionist artwork into a business model with this intriguing website. Each image on this product developer's homepage slides out to cover the previous image, offering little context around the object you now see in front of you. But it’s that lack of context that makes you want to learn more.</p> \n<p>Plus, the tagline, \"Souvenirs of The Near Future,\" suggests these objects are a part of their product line — and an opportunity for you to bring these innovative objects into your life.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"tej chauhan best website design award winner\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-37-73-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-37-73-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<h3><em><strong><a href=\"https://tejchauhan.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12px;\">Image Source</a></strong></em></h3> \n<p>Want a similar look for your website? Check out the new<a href=\"https://themeforest.net/lp/hubspot-cms-hub-themes\"> </a><a href=\"https://themeforest.net/lp/hubspot-cms-hub-themes\">CMS Hub theme collection</a> on the Envato marketplace.</p> \n<h4>Amanda Martocchio Architecture</h4> \n<p>An architecture firm might not specialize in web development, but its website should still demonstrate its commitment to visually pleasing design. Amanda Martocchio took that to heart with this gorgeous website.</p> \n<p>It's no secret that<a href=\"http://amandamartocchio.com/\"> </a><a href=\"http://amandamartocchio.com/\">Amanda Martocchio Architecture</a> loves its work — each picture on the homepage of its website is an enchanting shot of the houses the company designs. The website labels every house you scroll through with the type of design that was intended, along with numerous angles to each building.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"amanda martpcchio best website design award winner\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-34-12-AM.png?width=600&amp;name=34%20of%20the%20Best%20Website%20Designs%20to%20Inspire%20You%20in%202022-Feb-05-2022-12-30-34-12-AM.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><em><a href=\"https://amandamartocchio.com/\" style=\"font-size: 12px;\">Image Source</a></em></p> \n<a></a> \n<h2>Website Design Ideas</h2> \n<p>Now that you've seen a number of beautifully designed and award-winning platforms, keep these potential ideas in mind as you create your own.</p> \n<ul> \n <li>Consider ways that you can make your website interactive, like the 1917 example.</li> \n <li>Make a website that<a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/mobile-website-design-examples\"> </a><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/mobile-website-design-examples\">emphasizes the mobile experience</a>, even while it still has a good UX on desktops.</li> \n <li>Create a website that tells a story about your brand with photos, text, or video.</li> \n <li>If you can't create a heavily interactive site, consider drawing in eyes with a site that presents a slideshow of your photos.</li> \n <li>Ensure your call-to-actions are easy to see and encourage visitors to continue exploring your site</li> \n <li><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/website/main-website-navigation-ht\">Keep navigation clean</a>. Ensure your visitors always know how to get back to the homepage.</li> \n <li>Integrate your social media sites via social embed buttons, so site visitors can easily follow you on your various social channels.</li> \n <li>Keep each of your web pages consistent in design — including font, colors, images, and messaging.</li> \n <li>Test your website's usability with a<a href=\"https://www.hotjar.com/\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.hotjar.com/\" style=\"color: #0091ae;\">heat map</a>, which will show you on which web pages your visitors are most likely to bounce.</li> \n <li>Include a live chat or chatbot to give visitors the option to engage with you directly on your website if they prefer live chat to phone calls.<a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/service/customers-want-live-chat?_ga=2.119658890.383792882.1603898067-1463880398.1603898067\"> </a><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/service/customers-want-live-chat?_ga=2.119658890.383792882.1603898067-1463880398.1603898067\" style=\"color: #0091ae;\">Live chat can automate functions for your sales and service reps</a> and create a better communication experience for the customer.</li> \n <li>Get an<a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/what-is-ssl?_ga=2.119658890.383792882.1603898067-1463880398.1603898067\"> </a><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/what-is-ssl?_ga=2.119658890.383792882.1603898067-1463880398.1603898067\" style=\"color: #0091ae;\">SSL certificate</a> to ensure your website is secure.<a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/what-is-ssl?_ga=2.119658890.383792882.1603898067-1463880398.1603898067\"> </a><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/what-is-ssl?_ga=2.119658890.383792882.1603898067-1463880398.1603898067\" style=\"color: #0091ae;\">SSL is part of Google's search ranking algorithm</a>, so an SSL certificate can help you rank higher in search.</li> \n</ul> \n<h2>Build a Beautiful Website for your Business</h2> \n<p>Designing a website can be simple once you have a look and feel in mind. Use these examples as a springboard to develop the layout, color palette, imagery, and animations on your website.</p> \n<p>Once you’re ready to start coding or dragging and dropping, you’ll have a beautiful website that your visitors will enjoy.</p> \n<p><em>Editor's note: This post was originally published in January 2021 and has been updated for comprehensiveness.</em></p> \n<p><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=a1077f76-df2c-4b45-8ebc-dc2732f30850&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; \" alt=\"examples of brilliant homepage, blog, and landing page design\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/a1077f76-df2c-4b45-8ebc-dc2732f30850.png\" /></a></p> 16:26:48","updatedTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:48","title":"7 Steps to Create a Complete Marketing Strategy in 2022","link":"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy","description":"<p>The truth is, keeping up with marketing trends could be a full-time job.</p> \n<p><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=aacfe6c7-71e6-4f49-979f-76099062afa0&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; margin: 0 auto; display: block; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px\" alt=\"→ Download Now: Free Marketing Plan Template\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/aacfe6c7-71e6-4f49-979f-76099062afa0.png\" align=\"middle\" /></a></p> \n<p>In 2022 alone, we've seen a major shift to <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/short-form-video-trends\"><span>short-form video content</span></a>; the rise and fall of new platforms (looking at you, Meta); and the continuing impact of the global pandemic. In short, what worked for your marketing strategy in the past might not fly today.</p> \n<p>To succeed in the fast-paced marketing world — and maintain a sense of relevance with your audience — it's vital to stay ahead of the curve.&nbsp;</p> \n<p>To help ease some of that uncertainty, we've created this guide to show you step-by-step how to create a marketing strategy that leaves no stone unturned.</p> \n<p>Let's dive into the critical components of a complete marketing strategy in 2022, followed by some examples for inspiration.</p> \n<h2>The Importance of Customer-Driven Marketing Strategy Steps</h2> \n<p>A robust marketing strategy will reach your target audience – this includes those who have never heard of your brand all the way to repeat customers.</p> \n<p>Without a defined strategy, you’ll essentially be throwing things to the wall to see what sticks. And it’s costing you cost, time, and resources.</p> \n<p>A marketing strategy will:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>Align your team to specific goals.</li> \n <li>Help you tie your efforts to business objectives.</li> \n <li>Allow you to identify and test what resonates with your target audience.</li> \n</ul> \n<p>There are seven key steps to crafting a successful marketing strategy: Build your marketing plan, create your buyer personas, identify your goals, select the tools, review your existing resources, audit and plan media campaigns, and lastly, execute your strategy.</p> \n<p>Let’s get into the details of each step in the next section. Or you can jump to the section you're most interested in.</p> \n<ul> \n <li><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy#marketing-strategy\">7 Steps of a Marketing Strategy</a> \n  <ul> \n   <li><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy#marketing-plan\">Build a marketing plan</a>.</li> \n   <li><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy#buyer-persona\">Create buyer personas</a>.</li> \n   <li><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy#identify-goals\">Identify goals</a>.</li> \n   <li><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy#select-tools\">Select the appropriate tools</a>.</li> \n   <li><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy#review-media\">Review your media</a>.</li> \n   <li><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy#audit-campaigns\">Audit and plan media campaigns</a>.</li> \n   <li><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy#bring-to-fruition\">Bring it to fruition</a>.</li> \n  </ul> </li> \n</ul> \n<ul> \n <li style=\"list-style-type: none;\"><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy#examples-of-succesul-strategies\">Examples of Successful Marketing Strategies</a></li> \n <li><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/marketing-strategy#what-to-expect-next\">What to Do After Following Your Marketing Process Steps</a></li> \n</ul> \n<a></a> \n<p></p> \n<a></a> \n<h3>1. Build a marketing <span style=\"font-size: 1.5rem; font-weight: 500;\">plan.</span></h3> \n<p>Wait, I have to make a plan for my strategy? What's the difference?</p> \n<p>Your marketing strategy provides an overview of the reasons why your marketing team will need certain resources, take certain actions, and set certain goals over the year. Your marketing plan is the specific actions you'll take to achieve that strategy.</p> \n<p>Not sure where to start?<a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/marketing-plan-template\"> </a><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/marketing-plan-template?hubs_post-cta=imageheader\">This free marketing plan template</a> can help.</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/marketing-plan-template?hubs_post-cta=image\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/mkt-plan-cover-1.png?width=291&amp;name=mkt-plan-cover-1.png\" alt=\"marketing-strategy-template-free\" width=\"291\" style=\"width: 291px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></a></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center; font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/marketing-plan-template?hubs_post-cta=imagebottom\">Download for Free</a></p> \n<p>The right template can help you build a marketing plan that identifies your budget for the year, the initiatives your marketing organization needs to tackle, and the marketing channels you'll use to implement those initiatives.</p> \n<a></a> \n<p>Plus, it’ll tie everything back to a business summary, to keep you aligned with overarching company goals.</p> \n<p></p> \n<h3>2. Create buyer personas.</h3> \n<p>If you can't define who your audience is in one sentence, now's your chance to do it. A buyer persona is a snapshot of your ideal customer.</p> \n<p>For example, a store like Macy's could define a buyer persona as Budgeting Belinda, a stylish working-class woman in her 30s living in a suburb, looking to fill her closet with designer deals at low prices.</p> \n<p>With this description, Macy's Marketing department can picture Budgeting Belinda and work with a clear definition in mind.</p> \n<p>Buyer personas have critical demographic and psychographic information, including age, job title, income, location, interests, and challenges. Notice how Belinda has all of those attributes in her description.</p> \n<p>You don't have to create your buyer persona with a pen and paper. In fact,<a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/persona-templates?hubs_post-cta=anchor&amp;hsCtaTracking=7faf1d61-e857-4d2c-9cf2-10b32f7880af%7C7dda2041-868b-4701-9c92-417128517f48&amp;_ga=2.266419789.271348628.1571240896-940436819.1565181751\"> </a><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/persona-templates?hubs_post-cta=anchor&amp;hsCtaTracking=7faf1d61-e857-4d2c-9cf2-10b32f7880af%7C7dda2041-868b-4701-9c92-417128517f48&amp;_ga=2.266419789.271348628.1571240896-940436819.1565181751\">HubSpot offers a free template you can use to make your own (and it's really fun).</a></p> \n<p>You can also use a platform like <a href=\"https://versium.com/\">Versium</a>, which helps you identify, understand and reach your target audience through data and artificial intelligence.</p> \n<a></a> \n<p>Buyer personas should be at the core of building your strategy.</p> \n<h3>3. Identify your goals.</h3> \n<p>Your marketing strategy goals should reflect your business goals.</p> \n<p>For example, if one of your business goals is to have 300 people attend your annual conference in three months, your goal as a marketer should be along the lines of boosting online registration by 10% at the end of the month to stay on track.</p> \n<p>Other marketing goals might be to increase brand awareness or generate high-quality leads. You might also want to grow or maintain thought leadership in your industry or increase customer value.</p> \n<a></a> \n<p>Whatever your goals, identify what they are and how your marketing organization can work to achieve them over the next year.</p> \n<h3>4. Select the appropriate tools.</h3> \n<p>Once you have your goals identified, make sure you have the right tools to measure the success of those goals.</p> \n<p>Online software like social media schedulers gives you analytics to help you keep track of what your audience likes and doesn't. Alternatively, you might consider<a href=\"https://analytics.google.com/analytics/web/\"> </a><a href=\"https://analytics.google.com/analytics/web/\">Google Analytics</a> to measure blog and web page performance.</p> \n<p>Additionally, make your goals SMART – to do so, take a look at <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/how-to-write-a-smart-goal-template\">How to Write a SMART Goal [+ Free SMART Goal Template</a>].</p> \n<p>Here are a few tools that can help you track and measure the success of your marketing goals:</p> \n<h4><a href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/products/marketing\">HubSpot Marketing Hub</a></h4> \n<p>The Marketing Hub allows you to consolidate all of your marketing tools into one centralized platform.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"hubspot marketing hub dashboard\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021.png?width=624&amp;name=The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" /></p> \n<p>Too often, you’ll find a tool that’s powerful but not very easy to use. With this tool, you can attract users with blogs, SEO, and live chat tools. You can then convert and nurture those leads through marketing automation, the landing page builder, and lead tracking features.</p> \n<p>With custom reporting and built-in analytics, you can analyze your data and plan out your next move. Plus, HubSpot Marketing Hub integrates with over 500 tools.</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/pricing/marketing?hubs_content=www.hubspot.com%2Fproducts%2Fmarketing&amp;hubs_content-cta=hsg-nav__link-active&amp;products=marketing-hub-starter_1&amp;term=annual\">Pricing</a>: Free; Starter, $45/month; Professional, $800/month; Enterprise, $3,200/month.</p> \n<h4><a href=\"http://Trello.com\">Trello</a></h4> \n<p><img alt=\"trello-for-marketing-planning\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-1.jpeg?width=624&amp;name=The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-1.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: 0.00px;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" /></p> \n<p>Trello keeps your marketing team on track and openly communicating about the projects they're working on. Create boards for individual campaigns, editorial calendars, or quarterly goals.</p> \n<p>Built-in workflows and automation capabilities keep communication streamlined, and simplicity keeps your marketing team focused on the work that matters.</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://trello.com/en-US/pricing\">Pricing</a>: Free; Standard Class, $5/month; Premium Class, $10/month for 100 users; Enterprise, $17.50/month for 250 users.</p> \n<h4><a href=\"https://truenorth.io?utm_source=hubspot&amp;utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_campaign=marketing-strategy\">TrueNorth</a></h4> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/truenorth-tool.png?width=598&amp;name=truenorth-tool.png\" alt=\"truenorth-software\" width=\"598\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 598px;\">TrueNorth is a marketing management platform built to help you hit your marketing goals. Built specifically for marketing teams, TrueNorth turns your marketing strategy into a visual projection of your growth, which is used to create monthly milestones that help you stay on track.<br><br>One of the key benefits of TrueNorth is that it centralizes all of your ideas, campaigns, and results in one place, with everything tied back to your goal.<br><br><a href=\"https://truenorth.io/\">Pricing</a>: $115/month (free for 30 days).</br></br></br></br></img></p> \n<h4><a href=\"http://Monday.com\">Monday.com</a></h4> \n<p><img alt=\"monday.com hubspot integration\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-2.png?width=624&amp;height=232&amp;name=The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-2.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\" height=\"232\">Everything on Monday.com starts with a board or visually driven table. Create and customize workflows for your team and keep groups, items, sub-items, and updates synced in real-time.</img></p> \n<p>You can also transform data pulled from timeline and Gantt views to track your projects on Monday.com and ensure deadlines have been met. Plus, with more than 40 integrations — from SurveyMonkey to Mailchimp and, of course,<a href=\"https://ecosystem.hubspot.com/marketplace/apps/productivity/project-management/monday-com-203938\"> </a><a href=\"https://ecosystem.hubspot.com/marketplace/apps/productivity/project-management/monday-com-203938\">HubSpot</a> — you can visualize your data and ensure your whole company is collaborating.</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://monday.com/pricing/\">Pricing</a>: Basic, $8/month/seat; Standard, $10/month/seat; Pro, $16/month/seat; Enterprise, contact for pricing.</p> \n<h4><a href=\"http://semrush.com\">SEMrush</a></h4> \n<p><img alt=\"semrush dashboard\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-3.jpeg?width=624&amp;name=The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-3.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"624\">SEO continues to be a huge factor in the successful ranking of your website.</img></p> \n<p>SEMrush allows you to run a technical SEO audit, track daily rankings,<a href=\"https://www.growthmarketingpro.com/growthbar/\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.growthmarketingpro.com/growthbar/\">analyze your competitor's SEO strategy</a>, research millions of keywords, and even source ideas for earning more organic traffic.</p> \n<p>But the benefits don't stop at SEO. Use SEMRush for PPC, building and measuring an effective social media strategy, content planning, and even market research.</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.semrush.com/prices/\">Pricing</a>: Pro, $119/month; Guru, $229/month; Business, $449/month.</p> \n<h4><a href=\"http://buzzsumo.com\">Buzzsumo</a></h4> \n<p><img alt=\"buzzsumo marketing strategy tool\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-4.jpeg?width=400&amp;name=The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-4.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 400px;\" title=\"\" width=\"400\" /></p> \n<p>BuzzSumo allows you to analyze data to enhance and lead your marketing strategy, all while exploring high-performing content in your industry.</p> \n<p>Use the platform to identify influencers who may help your brand reach, monitor comments, and find trends to make the most of every turn.</p> \n<p>As your needs evolve, you can also leverage their crisis management and video marketing tools.</p> \n<p><a href=\"https://app.buzzsumo.com/settings/plans\">Pricing</a>: Plus, $179/month; Large, $299/month; Enterprise, contact for pricing.</p> \n<h4><a href=\"http://crazyegg.com\">Crazy Egg</a></h4> \n<p><img alt=\"crazyegg website optimization\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021.jpeg?width=400&amp;name=The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; width: 400px; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"400\">Need to optimize your website this year? Consider getting started with Crazy Egg. You'll be able to identify \"attention hotspots\" on your product pages, track ad campaign traffic on your site, and understand if shoppers are clicking where you want them to.</img></p> \n<p>You can even make sure your \"Buy Now\" buttons are in the best place.</p> \n<p>Crazy Egg also offers recordings, A/B testing, and more to help ensure your website is offering the best user experience.</p> \n<a></a> \n<p><a href=\"https://www.crazyegg.com/pricing\">Pricing</a>: Basic, $24/month; Standard, $49/month; Plus, $99/month; Pro, $249/month; Enterprise, contact for pricing.</p> \n<h3>5. Review your media.</h3> \n<p>Decide what you already have in your arsenal that can help you create your strategy. To streamline this process, think of your assets in three categories – paid, owned, and earned media.</p> \n<ul> \n <li><strong><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/earned-owned-paid-media-lead-generation\">Paid media</a></strong> means any channel you spend money on to attract your target audience. This includes offline channels like television, direct mail, and billboard to online channels like social media, search engines, and websites.</li> \n <li><strong>Owned Media</strong> refers to any of the media your marketing team has to create: pictures, videos, podcasts, ebooks, infographics, etc.</li> \n <li><strong><a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/what-is-earned-media-faqs\">Earned media</a></strong> is another way to say <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/user-generated-content-stats\">user-generated content</a>. Shares on social media, tweets about your business, and photos posted on Instagram mentioning your brand are all examples of earned media.</li> \n</ul> \n<p>Gather your materials in each media type and consolidate them in one location to have a clear vision of what you have and how you can integrate them to maximize your strategy.</p> \n<p>For example, if you already have a blog that's rolling out weekly content in your niche (owned media), you might consider promoting your blog posts on Twitter (paid media), which customers might then reTweet (earned media). Ultimately, that will help you create a better, more well-rounded marketing strategy.</p> \n<a></a> \n<p>If you have resources that don't fit into your goals, nix them. This is a great time to clean house and identify gaps in your materials.</p> \n<h3>6. Audit and plan media campaigns.</h3> \n<p>Cleaning house segues straight into this step. Now, you must decide which content is going to help you.</p> \n<p>Focus on your owned media and marketing goals. For instance, will updating the CTAs at the end of your blog posts help you increase RSVPs to your event?</p> \n<p>Next, look at your buyer personas. Let's say you work for a video editing software company. If one of your persona's challenges is adding clean sound effects to their videos but you don't have any content that reflects that, make a 15-second demo video for Instagram to show how great your product is at solving that challenge.</p> \n<p>Finally, create a content creation plan. The plan should include topic clusters, goals, format, and channel for each piece of content. Be sure to include which challenge it's solving for your buyer persona.</p> \n<a></a> \n<p>For ideas on content creation or a more in-depth look at how to create a content plan, check out our post, <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/content-creation\">The Ultimate Guide to Content Creation</a>.</p> \n<h3>7. Bring it to fruition.</h3> \n<p>At this point, your market research and planning should help you visualize how your strategy will be executed – and by which teams.</p> \n<p>The final step is to bring that all together and assign <em>actions</em> to your plans.</p> \n<p>Create a document that maps out the steps you need to take to execute your campaign. In other words, define your strategy.</p> \n<p>Think long-term when creating this document. A standard strategy document is 12 months. This structured timeline should be the home base for your strategic marketing efforts.</p> \n<p>To paint an example, let's go back to the video software company.</p> \n<p>Maybe in January, you will launch a software update that improves the exportation process for users. In April, you want to publish an ebook that explains editing terms to your buyer personas, and in September, you plan to launch an integration with other software.</p> \n<p>Remember, your <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/digital-strategy-guide\">digital strategy</a> is unique to your business, so the document should be as well. As long as the strategy includes the pertinent details outlined in previous sections, you'll be set.</p> \n<a></a> \n<p>Now that we've explored the critical steps of a complete marketing strategy, let's look at some <em>\"Why didn't I think of that?\"</em> strategies to inspire your own.</p> \n<h2>Examples of Successful Marketing Strategies</h2> \n<h3>1. <strong><a href=\"https://www.regmovies.com/\">Regal Movies</a></strong></h3> \n<h4><strong>Digital strategy: Owned media</strong></h4> \n<p>Regal Movies took the Halloween spirit to a new level, even renaming its Twitter account to reflect the spirit of the season. This \"Monster Madness\" poll is a fun, interactive way to get followers invested in Regal's content:</p> \n<p><img alt=\"regal movies' owned media\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-1.png?width=400&amp;name=The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-1.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; width: 400px; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" title=\"\" width=\"400\" /></p> \n<p style=\"font-size: 12px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://twitter.com/RegalMovies/status/1183437779826556928\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p>Regal's tweet is an example of owned media because the company was in full control of the answers followers gave (and, apparently, <em>American Werewolf</em> didn't stand a chance).</p> \n<p>Regal effectively kept true to their brand by using only classic movies in their poll while still putting a modern spin on it.</p> \n<p>This is also a good example of how retweets don't necessarily equal success. While four retweets aren't that big of a deal, check out the votes: 461. That means there were over 400 interactions with a single tweet.</p> \n<h4>2. <a href=\"https://www.lacroixwater.com/\">La Croix</a></h4> \n<h4><strong>Digital strategy: User-generated content, earned media</strong></h4> \n<p>User-generated content is one of the best ways to gain traction in your strategy.</p> \n<p>It demonstrates your appreciation for loyal customers, builds community, and also incentivizes other users' to promote your products for the chance at a similar shout-out.</p> \n<p>Plus, sometimes the content your brand loyalists create is really, really good.</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/lacroix.png?width=330&amp;name=lacroix.png\" alt=\"lacroix\" width=\"330\" style=\"width: 330px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center; font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"https://www.instagram.com/lacroixwater/?hl=en\"><span>Image Source</span></a></p> \n<p>In this case, the consumer is praising the brand’s product. Doesn’t get better than a fantastic review like that.</p> \n<h4>3. <strong><a href=\"https://www.smallgirlspr.com/\">Small Girls PR</a></strong></h4> \n<h4><strong>Digital strategy: Event marketing</strong></h4> \n<p>Wait, is that Keke Palmer?</p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/olay.png?width=330&amp;name=olay.png\" alt=\"olay\" width=\"330\" style=\"width: 330px; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" /></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center; font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/B3Zv_d5BmGs/\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p>Small Girls PR is a boutique PR company based in New York, and one of the company's talents is throwing amazing events for their clients, like Olay. This event recap carousel on Instagram is an effective event marketing example, as it boosts awareness for your brand and offers social proof by featuring a public figure.</p> \n<h4>4. <a href=\"http://superside.com\">Superside</a></h4> \n<h4><strong>Digital strategy: Paid media</strong></h4> \n<p>Design agency Superside launched an Instagram ad to promote a lead magnet: Their digital ad design guide. While the brand may have created the guide specifically for paid promotions, it’s also possible that they repurposed a high-performing blog post into a downloadable ebook.</p> \n<img alt=\"marketing strategy paid media example\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-2.jpeg?width=218&amp;name=The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-2.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 218px;\" title=\"\" width=\"218\"> <p>In this case, all they had to do was repackage their current content, build an ad around it with creative assets, and run it.</p> <p>In previous sections, we discussed the power of leveraging multiple forms of media in your marketing strategy. This is a great example of it.</p> <h4><strong>5.</strong><a href=\"http://target.com\" style=\"font-size: 1.375rem;\"><strong> Target</strong></a></h4> <h4><strong>Digital strategy: Paid media, Twitter cards</strong></h4> <p>If you've got the budget for paid media, take full advantage of it.</p> <p>Paid media is when you pay social channels, like Twitter, to promote your content on their site. By doing this, your content reaches new audiences you might not be able to reach organically:</p> <p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img alt=\"target marketing strategy example\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-Oct-13-2021-10-44-03-56-PM.jpeg?width=300&amp;name=The%20Step-by-Step%20Guide%20to%20Creating%20a%20Complete%20Marketing%20Strategy%20in%202021-Oct-13-2021-10-44-03-56-PM.jpeg\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 300px;\" title=\"\" width=\"300\" /></p> <p style=\"text-align: center; font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"https://twitter.com/Target/status/1182673802746089472?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw\">Image Source</a></p> <p>This inclusive ad from Target about fall shopping uses Twitter cards to promote the brand and make shopping easy with the click of a button.</p> <a></a> <p>More social channels are offering ways for shoppers to purchase in-app or close to it, driving sales and boosting exposure for brands.</p> <h2>What to Expect After Following Your Marketing Process Steps</h2> <p>Ultimately, creating a complete marketing strategy isn't something that can happen overnight. It takes time, hard work, and dedication to ensure you're reaching your ideal audience, whenever and wherever they want to be reached.</p> <p>Stick with it (and use some of the resources we've included in this post), and over time, research and customer feedback will help you refine your strategy to ensure you're spending most of your time on the marketing channels your audience cares most about.</p> <p><em>Editor's note: This post was originally published in October 2019. It has been updated for freshness and accuracy.</em></p> <p><a class=\"cta_button\"
