And I know that I can</span><span>'</span><span>t let them bring me down.\" — Tame Impala, \"Be Above It\"</span></li> \n  <li><span><span>\"I'm on the pursuit of happiness and I know e</span><span>verything that shine ain't always gonna be gold, hey, </span><span>I'll be fine once I get it, yeah, I'll be good.\" — Kid Cudi, \"Pursuit of Happiness (Nightmare)\"</span></span></li> \n  <li><span><span>\"There’s much more to life than dyin’ over your past mistakes and people who threw dirt on your name.\" — Lil Nas X, \"Sun Goes Down\"</span></span></li> \n  <li><span><span>\"They say the loudest in the room is weak, that's what they assume, but I disagree.\" — Tyler the Creator, \"911/Mr. Lonely\"</span></span></li> \n  <li><span><span>\"You don't have to be like everybody else, you don't have to fit into the norm, you are not here to conform.\" — Marina, \"Ancient Dreams in a Modern Land\"</span></span></li> \n  <li><span><span>\"Throw me in the fire, baby, I'll survive.\" — BROCKHAMPTON, \"RENTAL\"</span></span></li> \n </ol> <a></a> <h2>Holiday Instagram Captions</h2> <p>Around the holidays, you want to post and share the memories you’ve made throughout the years. For whichever one you’re celebrating, take some inspiration from our favorite Instagram captions and spread some holiday cheer.</p> <h3>New Year's Instagram Captions</h3> \n <ol> \n  <li>\"Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any other.\" <em>— Abraham Lincoln</em></li> \n  <li>Didn't make it to midnight.</li> \n  <li>Resolutions are made to be broken.</li> \n  <li>Ringing in the new year — like a bell.</li> \n  <li>\"Tomorrow is the first blank page of a 365-page book. Write a good one.\" <em>— Brad Paisley</em></li> \n  <li>New year, same me.</li> \n  <li>Time to show off my bubbly personality.</li> \n  <li>Any excuse to wear glitter.</li> \n  <li>Starting off the year on the right foot.</li> \n  <li>There are 12 months ahead of us to make a difference.</li> \n  <li>Day 1 of 365</li> \n  <li>Sip, sip, hooray!</li> \n </ol> <h3>Valentine's Day Instagram Captions</h3> <p><img src=\"https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/NhWfvmCcmtqF85KnU0YIHeu0OjuH2JsjeA02xF2pUIfuBmH_YhpP6r_nlubnWcPUzWFBQi9Iznl-bd5wFRQ5FC-r8eh2rAYfLAGAzSXSaVwDaSAjZp86b9QpS-fyxyr4BVRhOqyX\" width=\"350\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 350px;\" alt=\"IG captions:  You can't blame gravity for falling in love\" /></p> \n <ol> \n  <li>Roses are red. Violets are blue. Consider this post my Valentine to you.</li> \n  <li>Don't tell me you love me. Tell me you're outside with pizza.</li> \n  <li>All I need is you. (And maybe wine + chocolate too.)</li> \n  <li>\"You can't blame gravity for falling in love.\" <em>— Albert Einstein</em></li> \n  <li>99% of my socks are single, and you don't see them crying about it.</li> \n  <li>I will do anything for love. Except that. And that. Or that. Or...</li> \n  <li>Sorry, I'm in a relationship with tacos.</li> \n  <li>\"All the single ladies…\" — Beyonce, \"Single Ladies\"</li> \n  <li>In love with my best friend.</li> \n  <li>I’m better when I’m with you.</li> \n </ol> <h3>Halloween Instagram Captions</h3> \n <ol> \n  <li>Creepin’ it real.</li> \n  <li>I brake for Reese's Peanut Butter Cups.</li> \n  <li>\"When the spooks have a midnight jamboree, they break it up with fiendish glee...\" — The Legend of Sleepy Hollow (1949)</li> \n  <li>You're just my (blood) type.</li> \n  <li>How to eat candy corn: don't.</li> \n  <li>#squadghouls</li> \n  <li>Double, double toil and trouble; Fire burn and cauldron bubble.</li> \n  <li>Driving me batty.</li> \n  <li>“Scary hours.” — Drake</li> \n  <li>Resting Witch Face</li> \n </ol> <h3>Thanksgiving</h3> \n <ol> \n  <li>I'm wearing my elastic pants.</li> \n  <li>\"For those of you who cannot be with family this Thanksgiving, please resist the urge to brag.\" <em>— Andy Borowitz</em></li> \n  <li>On a veggie diet this Thanksgiving: Carrot cake and pumpkin pie.</li> \n  <li>\"Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don't have, you will never, ever have enough.\"<em> — Oprah Winfrey</em></li> \n  <li>I think, therefore I cran.</li> \n  <li>Bad day to be a turkey.</li> \n  <li>Need fuel for Black Friday.</li> \n  <li>\"Okay, guys. I have exactly 28 minutes before I have to baste again.\" <em>— Monica</em></li> \n  <li>Grateful. Thankful. Blessed.</li> \n  <li>Who made the potato salad?</li> \n  <li>There’s always something to be thankful for.</li> \n </ol> <h3>Christmas &amp; Hannukah Instagram Captions</h3> \n <ol> \n  <li>You sleigh me.</li> \n  <li>Fa la la la llama.</li> \n  <li>\"O Christmas tree, O Christmas tree, your ornaments are history.\"<em> — The Cat</em></li> \n  <li>\"It's not what's under the Christmas tree that matters. It's who's around it.\" <em>— Charles M. Schulz</em></li> \n  <li>Dear Santa, let's not talk about this.</li> \n  <li>Rebel Without a Claus</li> \n  <li>Doesn't Santa have anything better to do than watch us while we're sleeping?</li> \n  <li>All I want for Christmas is you (and wine would be nice).</li> \n  <li>To all you cotton-headed ninny-mugginses out there.</li> \n  <li>Drop it like a top.</li> \n  <li>Wishing you a latke love this Hanukkah.</li> \n  <li>I want to eat 8 latkes for the calories of one.</li> \n  <li>One little candle can light up an entire room.</li> \n  <li>Keep calm and spin that dreidel.</li> \n  <li>Deck the halls with matzo balls!</li> \n  <li>It’s Christmas time and I’m the gift.</li> \n  <li>The best gift is to be present with the ones you love.</li> \n </ol> <a></a> <h2>Seasonal Instagram Captions</h2> <p>As the seasons come and go, why not share your joy for the next one on your Instagram? Whether you love the sunshine in the Summer, or snowfall in the winter, you can share that excitement with others.</p> <p>Ring in the new season with some of these witty, seasonal captions.</p> <h3>Spring Instagram Captions</h3> \n <ol> \n  <li>Hello, spring!</li> \n  <li>\"And I think to myself, what a wonderful world.\"<em> — Louis Armstrong</em></li> \n  <li>April showers bring May flowers.</li> \n  <li>I think I just experienced all the seasons in a single day.</li> \n  <li>I love allergy season, said no one ever.</li> \n  <li>Currently soaking up the sun and smelling the roses. Please leave a message after the beep.</li> \n  <li>I owe a lot to the inventor of flip-flops.</li> \n  <li>\"Here comes the sun, and I say... It's all right.\" <em>— The Beatles</em></li> \n  <li>“Warm winds in the springtime.” — SZA, “Warm Winds”</li> \n  <li>Springing into the new season.</li> \n </ol> <h3>Summer Instagram Captions</h3> <p><img src=\"https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/evGNBMH14gTF6kzs83MdegvbT1dmQlcWNvE2Bp4pfGnNSc_RfUBkwBbVRrPf8FG6ztJijhVcRaMCYv23afpy4GYVC-48mJIXv4x9H7ehE7GLYJnkGFP_HqK_8gSo4iHbYDybGCaX\" width=\"350\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 350px;\" alt=\"IG captions: Here comes the sun and I say its all right\" /></p> \n <ol> \n  <li>\"Live in the sunshine. It's all right.\" — The Beatles, \"Here Comes the Sun\"</li> \n  <li>Tans, tans, tans across the board.</li> \n </ol> <h3>Fall Instagram Captions</h3> \n <ol> \n  <li>My favorite color is October.</li> \n  <li>\"Wild is the music of autumnal winds amongst the faded woods.\" <em>— William Wordsworth</em></li> \n  <li>My favorite kind of weather.</li> \n  <li>It's never too early for pumpkin spice.</li> \n  <li>Meet me in the corn maze.</li> \n  <li>Crisp air. Apple cider. Flaming foliage.</li> \n  <li>Pumpkin spice and everything nice.</li> \n  <li>\"Anyone who thinks fallen leaves are dead has never watched them dancing on a windy day.\"<em> — Shira Tamir</em></li> \n  <li>Leaves are falling, and autumn is calling.</li> \n  <li>“Days in the sun and nights in the rain. Summer is over, simple and plain.” — Drake &amp; Majid Jordan, \"Summer’s Over\"</li> \n  <li>Falling never felt so good.</li> \n </ol> <h3>Winter Instagram Captions</h3> \n <ol> \n  <li>\"In the depths of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.\" <em>— Albert Camus</em></li> \n  <li>If it's snowing, I'm not going.</li> \n  <li>Cozy nights. Good books. Hot chocolate.</li> \n  <li>Do you want to build a snowman?</li> \n  <li>Running on caffeine and holiday cheer.</li> \n  <li>\"Winter is not a season; it's a celebration.\" <em>— Anamika Mishra</em></li> \n  <li>Merry and brrrrrrright.</li> \n  <li>Having snow much fun.</li> \n  <li>‘Tis the season to be freezin’.</li> \n  <li>“Timb' laces get tighter and parka hoods flip up.” — Drake, “Come Winter”</li> \n </ol> <a></a> <h2>Selfie Instagram Captions</h2> <p>Selfies are a celebration of something unique, beautiful, and full of life — you! So when you share your next selfie, complement it with one of our favorite selfie Instagram captions.</p> <p><img src=\"https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/VdOGfNpEis_49i5zSOUQ2WwroBajKe_KiB8XeNCRl5z5oAYeQ42S0I787N4mjMApYiw_m1LeeE2JDs93f6hU_JuVCecZpp2iemTjUjxxU6W0TVGNgGKSqJVwKcuUAbWR7MhapOYh\" width=\"350\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 350px;\" alt=\"IG captions: Smile! The happiness is right under your nose\" /></p> \n <ol> \n  <li>Me, myself, and I.</li> \n  <li>Be yourself, there’s no one better.</li> \n  <li>It’s the happiness for me.</li> \n  <li>Smile! The happiness is right under your nose.</li> \n  <li>My favorite filter is reality.</li> \n  <li>Self-care selfie!<br>Conquer the world one smile at a time.</br></li> \n  <li>It’s a great day to have a great day.</li> \n  <li>The greatest gift you can give someone is a smile.</li> \n  <li>Self-love is the best love.</li> \n  <li>“But she looked powerful. She wore the sun like a shiny pin on the side of her hair.” -<em>Lilian Li</em></li> \n  <li>I don't need a hairstylist. My pillow gives me a new hairstyle every morning.</li> \n  <li>All-natural.</li> \n  <li>No filter.</li> \n  <li>Morning hair, don't care.</li> \n  <li>Quick #OOTD</li> \n  <li>Anything but basic.</li> \n  <li>Hard to be down to earth when you look out of this world.</li> \n  <li>Looking like I don't know how to lose.</li> \n  <li>Beautiful from halo to toe.</li> \n </ol> <a></a> <h2>Vacation Instagram Captions</h2> <p>When you want to treat yourself, a vacation is always a great reward.&nbsp;</p> <p>It’s a chance to experience different cultures, food, music and scenery. When you’re out exploring the world, share some of your favorite travel moments with these awesome Instagram captions.</p> \n <ol> \n  <li>A chance to get away from the everyday.</li> \n  <li>Work. Save. Travel. Repeat.</li> \n  <li>Staycation loading…</li> \n  <li>Collect the moments, not the materials.</li> \n  <li>Another destination off the bucket list.</li> \n  <li>An adventure to fill the soul.</li> \n  <li>The scenic route is always better.</li> \n  <li>I need a six-month vacation, twice a year.</li> \n  <li>Be back never.</li> \n  <li>Catch flights, not feelings.</li> \n  <li>Always take the scenic route.</li> \n  <li>I've never met a vacation I didn't like.</li> \n  <li>An adventure a day keeps the doctor away.</li> \n  <li>Travel is an investment in yourself.</li> \n  <li>Some call it vacation, I call it heaven.</li> \n  <li>\"I hate traveling.\" said no traveler ever.</li> \n  <li>If you need me, call me on my shell phone.</li> \n  <li>I can sea clearly now.</li> \n  <li>Happiness comes in waves.</li> \n  <li>A change in latitude helps my attitude.</li> \n </ol> <h2>Capture the Feeling with an Instagram Caption</h2> <p>Even though an image is worth 1,000 words, a well-written caption couldn’t hurt. These days, the caption can make just as much of a statement as the image! For all of the occasions that are worthy of a post to your feed, use one of the quotes from this list and customize it to make it your own.</p> <p><em>Editor's note: This post was originally published in June 2020 and has been updated for comprehensiveness.</em></p> <p><a class=\"cta_button\" Forsey","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/5e999bfc-f8b2-4ab7-96a8-c1467f450ca2.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn36@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-26-48-436_6a368182cf964ce9.webp","https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/r1WjSm56W13yxdtfr__8LHh-2JsSQwQrluZfW343DUMU-RKrtQ3JPEdnPBAYVxeXNXD70ccKYmQNNVpJGSPKuD3KaGpMAOpe6RHMsM7TD74Fe0uLXvmJl_uR02QvhSfRx-g-NxuY":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn32@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-26-50-713_d58bbbe178fce12d.webp","https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/tCfSv9WwxO6cfB2Ec-D9UcckmCm8oSueVhYcmIf3oZbUJ4A3eUR53XnzB6cAck7sclSrEgLyEvUIC3pJcQpr0LJis9XoksUH9MZPhwKNEpv98a9KgeDSq3jhZksYUSKDfwADZIID":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn14@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-26-54-977_02cf382070ff1568.webp","https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/tq0U7eEre0vLyAv8b2PuRXJBKD6xMZPgsusnp4vS-Sh6d5aR8Tp1zcNsfvVnuLvI5S-BcEylTjC9m0Ma9g405MQRy1C9A4HfIfL7fh10b-h7LtCMpThKp_JYfAKpzEawRsEU7rdb":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn88@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-26-50-040_c31b69a2f5ae8fd9.webp","https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/nJHp40zbvCoH57S2DBjmnHsq01r-RXm_tPxEnuB5EAuPT67QNCJZdyjAZWG63d6DsHbcuE2aQQEINf7g7omAL3PrR4OGfEA8Ws3Q66L0WUW78oZUuM_kwzmO_o9QodBxbjLf7tGu":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn59@2020_6/2022/03/14/08-26-53-166_1964bb625a0111b1.webp","https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/HEglvZTx5JmFugLRYrbZZg4VCoYNiGVmFR3gDSNT8HSh6zCNxQaTqjPmwKyda_BCH-aaytlVqwFHVeAsf-Ihx1KkM7dGwVyb2vddI_Z4DNPlEY6uVV_izxSG8GoIS5bX6cdYJj9c":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn92@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-26-53-049_e335a432f803052d.webp","https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/NhWfvmCcmtqF85KnU0YIHeu0OjuH2JsjeA02xF2pUIfuBmH_YhpP6r_nlubnWcPUzWFBQi9Iznl-bd5wFRQ5FC-r8eh2rAYfLAGAzSXSaVwDaSAjZp86b9QpS-fyxyr4BVRhOqyX":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn24@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-26-53-909_d905beab2bd0ea6e.webp","https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/evGNBMH14gTF6kzs83MdegvbT1dmQlcWNvE2Bp4pfGnNSc_RfUBkwBbVRrPf8FG6ztJijhVcRaMCYv23afpy4GYVC-48mJIXv4x9H7ehE7GLYJnkGFP_HqK_8gSo4iHbYDybGCaX":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn18@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-26-53-273_4febd22f450f16de.webp","https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/VdOGfNpEis_49i5zSOUQ2WwroBajKe_KiB8XeNCRl5z5oAYeQ42S0I787N4mjMApYiw_m1LeeE2JDs93f6hU_JuVCecZpp2iemTjUjxxU6W0TVGNgGKSqJVwKcuUAbWR7MhapOYh":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn81@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-26-53-530_27dbceb2fa393f87.webp","https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/2db39870-e18b-4909-9c9e-8606903b35fb.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn51@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-26-50-866_b8faa1ff5575500a.webp","https://track.hubspot.com/__ptq.gif?a=53&k=14&r=https%3A%2F%2Fblog.hubspot.com%2Fmarketing%2Finstagram-captions&bu=https%253A%252F%252Fblog.hubspot.com%252Fmarketing&bvt=rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn21@2020_4/2022/03/14/08-26-56-284_1ce20a46808184a6.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1647246408220},{"createdTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:48","updatedTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:48","title":"27 Mission and Vision Statement Examples That Will Inspire Your Buyers","link":"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/inspiring-company-mission-statements","description":"<p>Think about the brands you purchase from over and over. Why do you choose to buy products and or services from them even when cheaper options exist?</p> \n<p>Well, there's a good reason for it — because of their values. The best brands combine physical, emotional, and logical elements into one exceptional customer (and employee) experience that you value as much as they do.</p> \n<p>When your brand creates a genuine connection with customers and employees, they'll stay loyal to your company, thereby increasing your overall profitability. But this type of success doesn’t happen overnight.</p> \n<p><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=72c7ece3-b9c6-4064-8a2a-33f42783a2d5&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; margin: 0 auto; display: block; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px\" alt=\"→ Free Resource: 100 Mission Statement Templates &amp; Examples\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/72c7ece3-b9c6-4064-8a2a-33f42783a2d5.png\" align=\"middle\"></a></p> \n<p>Building brand loyalty, like creating mission and vision statements, takes time. If you’re in a bit of a time crunch, use this table of contents to find precisely what you’re looking for to inspire the development of your company’s mission:</p> \n<p></p> \n<p></p> \n<a></a> \n<p></p> \n<p>As a company grows, its objectives and goals may be reached, and in turn, they'll change. Therefore, mission statements should be revised as needed to reflect the business's new culture as previous goals are met.</p> \n<p>But first, you have to understand how to write a proper mission statement to build off of as your company evolves.</p> \n<p></p> \n<h3>1. Explain your company’s product or service offering.</h3> \n<p>You want prospects to understand what your company does in a literal sense. This means explaining your offering in basic, clear terms. Your explanation should answer the most basic questions like:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>Are you selling a product or service?</li> \n <li>Why would customers buy it?</li> \n <li>How does your offering solve for the customer?</li> \n</ul> \n<p>Record your answers and focus on how your product or service brings value to your <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/buyer-persona-research?_ga=2.259565891.832425509.1645127728-603726757.1645127728\">buyer personas</a>, otherwise known as your target audience.</p> \n<h3>2. Identify the company’s core values.</h3> \n<p>Now, this is where you can start thinking bigger. You didn’t just make a product or service at random, you most likely were motivated by a set of <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/company-values?_ga=2.259565891.832425509.1645127728-603726757.1645127728\">core values</a>.</p> \n<p>Core values are deeply ingrained principles that guide a company’s actions. Take HubSpot’s culture code, <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/blog/tabid/6307/bid/34234/the-hubspot-culture-code-creating-a-company-we-love.aspx?_ga=2.94915669.832425509.1645127728-603726757.1645127728#:~:text=Employees%20who%20work%20at%20HubSpot,%2C%20Adaptable%2C%20Remarkable%2C%20Transparent.\">HEART</a>, for example:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>Humble</li> \n <li>Empathetic</li> \n <li>Adaptable</li> \n <li>Remarkable</li> \n <li>Transparent</li> \n</ul> \n<p>These are principles that not only company employees respect, but are principles that our customers appreciate as well. By identifying core values that hold meaning on personal and organizational levels, you’ll have an appealing set to add to your mission statement.</p> \n<h3>3. Connect how your company's offering aligns with your values.</h3> \n<p>So how can your company offering serve your core values? You need to draw a connection between the two in a way that makes sense to the public.</p> \n<p>For example, if one of your core values is centered on innovation, you want to frame your product or service as pushing boundaries and explaining how it helps customers innovate their lives or business practices. Essentially, you’re taking the literal benefit of the offering and expanding it to serve a higher purpose.</p> \n<h3>4. Condense these statements into one.</h3> \n<p>A mission statement can be as short as a single sentence, or as long as a paragraph, but it’s meant to be a short summary of your company’s purpose. You need to state the what, who and why of your company:</p> \n<ul> \n <li><strong>What:</strong> The company offering</li> \n <li><strong>Who:</strong> Who you’re selling to</li> \n <li><strong>Why:</strong> The core values you do it for</li> \n</ul> \n<p>Once you have successfully conveyed your message, it’s time to refine and perfect your statement.</p> \n<h3>5. Make sure it’s clear, concise, and free of fluff.</h3> \n<p>Above all, your mission statement is a marketing asset that is meant to be clear, concise, and free of fluff. It should clearly outline the purpose of your company offering and demonstrate the common goals the company is working to achieve. You should also have other team members or advisors read the mission statement and make adjustments if needed according to their recommendation.</p> \n<p>Both mission and vision statements are often combined into one comprehensive \"mission statement\" to define the organization's reason for existing and its outlook for internal and external audiences — like employees, partners, board members, consumers, and shareholders.</p> \n<p>The difference between mission and vision statements lies in the purpose they serve.</p> \n<a></a> \n<p></p> \n<p>A mission statement is a literal quote stating what a brand or company is setting out to do. This lets the public know the product and service it provides, who it makes it for, and why it’s doing it. A vision statement is a brand looking toward the future and saying what it hopes to achieve through its mission statement. This is more conceptual, as it’s a glimpse into what the brand can become in the eyes of the consumer and the value it will bring in longevity.</p> \n<p>In summary, the main differences between a mission and vision statement are:</p> \n<ul> \n <li><strong>Mission statements</strong> describe the current purpose a company serves. The company's function, target audience, and key offerings are elements that are often mentioned in a mission statement.</li> \n <li><strong>Vision statements</strong> are a look into a company’s future or what its overarching vision is. The same elements from the mission statement can be included in a vision statement, but they'll be described in the future tense.</li> \n</ul> \n<p>Now that we know what they are, let’s dive into some useful examples of each across different industries.</p> \n<a></a> \n<p style=\"text-align: left;\"><a style=\"color: #33475b; text-decoration: none; font-weight: normal;\"></a></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><strong>Free Guide:</strong><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/100-mission-statements?hubs_post-cta=header\"> </a><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/100-mission-statements?hubs_post-cta=header\">100 Mission Statement Templates &amp; Examples</a></p> \n<p><a href=\"https://offers.hubspot.com/100-mission-statements?hubs_post-cta=image\"><img alt=\"100-mission-statements examples\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/17%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-1.gif?width=350&amp;name=17%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-1.gif\" title=\"\" width=\"350\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 350px;\"></a></p> \n<p>Need more examples to build your mission statement? Download our free overview of mission statements – complete with 100 templates and examples to help you develop a stand-out mission statement.</p> \n<h3>1. <a href=\"https://www.lifeisgood.com/company/about.html\">Life Is Good</a>: To spread the power of optimism.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Life is Good\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-47-08-PM.jpeg?width=250&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-47-08-PM.jpeg\" title=\"Life is Good logo\" width=\"250\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 250px;\"></p> \n<p>The Life is Good brand is about more than spreading optimism — although, with uplifting T-shirt slogans like \"Seas The Day\" and \"Forecast: Mostly Sunny,\" it's hard not to crack a smile.</p> \n<p>There are tons of T-shirt companies in the world, but Life is Good's mission sets itself apart with a<a href=\"http://content.lifeisgood.com/purpose/\"> </a>mission statement that goes beyond fun clothing: to spread the power of optimism.</p> \n<p>This mission is perhaps a little unexpected if you're not familiar with the company's public charity: How will a T-shirt company help spread optimism? Life is Good answers that question below the fold, where the mission is explained in more detail using a video and with links to the <a href=\"https://www.lifeisgood.com/blog/\">company’s community</a> and the <a href=\"https://www.lifeisgood.com/kidsfoundation/kidsfoundation.html?ecom=true\">Life is Good Kids Foundation page</a>. We really like how lofty yet specific this mission statement is — it's a hard-to-balance combination.</p> \n<h3>2. <a href=\"https://www.sweetgreen.com/our-story/\">sweetgreen</a>: To inspire healthier communities by connecting people to real food.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: sweetgreen's\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-45-71-PM.jpeg?width=400&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-45-71-PM.jpeg\" title=\"Sweet Green's logo\" width=\"400\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 400px;\"></p> \n<p>Notice that sweetgreen's mission is positioned to align with your values — not just written as something the brand believes. We love the inclusive language used in its statement.</p> \n<p>The language lets us know the company is all about connecting its<a href=\"http://sweetgreen.com/our-story/\"> </a>growing network of farmers growing healthy, local ingredients with us — the customer — because we're the ones who want more locally grown, healthy food options.</p> \n<p>The mission to connect people is what makes this statement so strong. And, that promise has gone beyond sweetgreen's website and walls of its food shops: The team has made strides in the communities where it's opened stores as well. Primarily, it provides education to young kids on healthy eating, fitness, sustainability, and where food comes from.</p> \n<h3>3. <a href=\"https://www.patagonia.com.au/pages/our-mission\">Patagonia</a>: We’re in business to save our home planet.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Patagonia\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-49-08-PM.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-49-08-PM.jpeg\" title=\"Mountains and landscape \" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></p> \n<p>Patagonia's mission statement spotlights the company’s commitment to help the environment and save the earth. The people behind the brand believe that among the most direct ways to limit ecological impacts is with goods that last for generations or can be recycled so the materials in them remain in use.</p> \n<p>In the name of this cause, the company donates time, services, and at least 1% of its sales to hundreds of environmental groups worldwide.</p> \n<p>If your company has a similar focus on growing your business and giving back, think about talking about both the benefit you bring to customers and the value you want to bring to a greater cause in your mission statement.</p> \n<h3>4. <a href=\"https://www.americanexpress.com/in/company/mission.html\">American Express</a>: Become essential to our customers by providing differentiated products and services to help them achieve their aspirations.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: American Express\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-4.png?width=400&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-4.png\" title=\"American Express\" width=\"400\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 400px;\"></p> \n<p>Customers will never love a company until the employees love it first.</p> \n<p>— <a href=\"https://twitter.com/simonsinek/status/456545886143643649\">Simon Sinek (@simonsinek)</a></p> \n<p>The tweet above is from <a href=\"https://twitter.com/simonsinek\">Simon Sinek</a>, and it's one that we repeat here at HubSpot all the time. American Express sets itself apart from other credit card companies in its list of values, with an ode to excellent customer service, which is something it’s famous for.</p> \n<p>We especially love the emphasis on teamwork and supporting employees so that the people inside the organization can be in the best position to support their customers.</p> \n<h3>5. <a href=\"https://www.warbyparker.com/history\">Warby Parker</a>: To offer designer eyewear at a revolutionary price, while leading the way for socially conscious businesses.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Warby Parker\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-49-39-PM.jpeg?width=400&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-49-39-PM.jpeg\" title=\"Warby Parker \" width=\"400\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 400px;\">This \"objective\" statement from Warby Parker uses words that reflect a young and daring personality: \"rebellious,\" \"revolutionary,\" \"socially-conscious.\" In one sentence, the brand takes us back to the root of why it was founded while also revealing its vision for a better future.</p> \n<p>The longer-form version of the mission reads: \"We believe that buying glasses should be easy and fun. It should leave you happy and good-looking, with money in your pocket,\" which further shows how Warby Parker doesn't hold back on letting its unique personality shine through. Here, the mission statement's success all comes down to spot-on word choice.</p> \n<h3>6. <a href=\"https://www.invisionapp.com/company\">InvisionApp</a>: Question Assumptions. Think Deeply. Iterate as a Lifestyle. Details, Details. Design is Everywhere. Integrity.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/vLSCcgqGINNDtMNLG_sWXthFTYX5By8DPDs9Kud7qDayzeutvJ6jBZrImwRfusVUn8qeNPs5ozjQVhnOeAH8dfo2I0BoYOvxNwTDHlKPSLQwmG9J9Ce_ZXlvXcmmlnpzKnAHZMj1\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\" alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: InVision App\"></p> \n<p>These days, it can seem like every B2B company page looks the same — but InvisionApp has one of the cooler<a href=\"http://www.invisionapp.com/company\"> </a>company pages I've seen. Scroll down to \"Our Core Values,\" and hover over any of the icons, and you'll find a short-but-sweet piece of the overall company mission under each one.</p> \n<p>We love the way the statements are laid out under each icon. Each description is brief, authentic, and business babble-free — which makes the folks at InvisionApp seem trustworthy and genuine.</p> \n<h3>7. <a href=\"https://www.honesttea.com/our-mission\">Honest Tea</a>: To create and promote great-tasting, healthy, organic beverages.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Honest Tea's\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-3.png?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-3.png\" title=\"Honest Tea\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></p> \n<p>Honest Tea's mission statement begins with a simple punch line connoting its tea is real, pure, and therefore not full of artificial chemicals. The brand is speaking to an audience that's tired of finding ingredients in its tea that can't be pronounced and has been searching for a tea that's exactly what it says it is.</p> \n<p>Not only does Honest Tea have a punny name, but it also centers its mission around the name. For some time, the company even<a href=\"https://www.honesttea.com/content/dam/nagbrands/us/honesttea/en/mission/CCD20-231%20HT%20Mission%20Brochure-R10.pdf\"> published a Mission Report</a> each year in an effort to be \"transparent about our business practices and live up to our mission to seek to create and promote great-tasting, healthier, organic beverages.\"</p> \n<h3>8. <a href=\"https://ikea.jobs.cz/en/vision-culture-and-values/#:~:text='To%20create%20a%20better%20everyday,be%20able%20to%20afford%20them'.\">IKEA</a>: To offer a wide range of well-designed, functional home furnishing products at prices so low that as many people as possible will be able to afford them</h3> \n<h3><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: IKEA\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-48-67-PM.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-48-67-PM.jpeg\" title=\"Ikea \" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></h3> \n<p>The folks at IKEA dream big. The vision-based mission statement could have been one of beautiful, affordable furniture, but instead, it's to make everyday life better for its customers. It's a partnership: IKEA finds deals all over the world and buys in bulk, then we choose the furniture and pick it up at a self-service warehouse.</p> \n<p>\"Our business idea supports this vision ... so [that] as many people as possible will be able to afford them,\"<a href=\"http://www.ikea.com/ms/en_SG/about_ikea/our_business_idea/index.html\"> the brand states</a>.</p> \n<p>Using words like \"as many people as possible\" makes a huge company like IKEA much more accessible and appealing to customers.</p> \n<h3>9. <a href=\"http://shop.nordstrom.com/c/company-history\">Nordstrom</a>: To give customers the most compelling shopping experience possible.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/KckXCKu2LdRAyGANsCMxkjFfeCJTqWGDLSHMzm98nbjWPrt3q1vy7MU4pVqvTdlleneDEVvwbYbhQlVHPvObLjk-ZVJBIsjtKuXXr3NIWsdpI0eg7JSYvTVWkrcJPgUbQxGFx6rq\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\" alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Nordstrom\"></p> \n<p>When it comes to customer commitment, not many companies are as hyper-focused as Nordstrom is. Although clothing selection, quality, and value all have a place in the company's mission statement, it’s crystal clear that it’s all about the customer: \"Nordstrom works relentlessly to give customers the most compelling shopping experience possible.\"</p> \n<p>If you've ever shopped at a Nordstrom, you'll know the brand will uphold the high standard for customer service mentioned in its mission statement, as associates are always roaming the sales floors, asking customers whether they've been helped, and doing everything they can to make the shopping experience a memorable one.</p> \n<h3>10. <a href=\"https://www.cradlestocrayons.org/what-we-do/our-mission-and-model/#:~:text=Our%20Mission%3A%20Cradles%20to%20Crayons,by%20engaging%20and%20connecting%20communities.\">Cradles to Crayons</a>: Provides children from birth through age 12, living in homeless or low-income situations, with the essential items they need to thrive – at home, at school, and at play.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Cradles to Crayons\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-45-18-PM.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-45-18-PM.jpeg\" title=\"Cradles to Crayons \" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></p> \n<p>Cradles to Crayons divided its mission and model into three sections that read like a game plan: The Need, The Mission, and The Model. The \"rule of three\" is a powerful rhetorical device called a tricolon that's usually used in speechwriting to help make an idea more memorable. A tricolon is a series of three parallel elements of roughly the same length — think \"I came; I saw; I conquered.\"</p> \n<h3>11. <a href=\"https://www.uhsinc.com/mission-statement/\">Universal Health Services, Inc.</a>: To provide superior quality healthcare services that: PATIENTS recommend to family and friends, PHYSICIANS prefer for their patients, PURCHASERS select for their clients, EMPLOYEES are proud of, and INVESTORS seek for long-term returns.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Universal Health Services\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-47-32-PM.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-47-32-PM.jpeg\" title=\"Universal Health Services\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></p> \n<p>A company thrives when it pleases its customers, its employees, its partners, and its investors — and Universal Health Services endeavors to do just that, according to its mission statement. As a health care service, it specifically strives to please its patients, physicians, purchasers, employees, and investors. We love the emphasis on each facet of the organization by capitalizing the font and making it red for easy skimming.</p> \n<h3>12. <a href=\"https://www.jetblue.com/corporate-social-responsibility/\">JetBlue</a>: To inspire humanity – both in the air and on the ground.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: JetBlue\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-46-81-PM.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-46-81-PM.jpeg\" title=\"JetBlue\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></p> \n<p>JetBlue's committed to its founding mission through lovable marketing, charitable partnerships, and influential programs — and we love the approachable language used to describe these endeavors. For example, the brand writes how it \"set out in 2000 to bring humanity back to the skies.\"</p> \n<p>For those of us who want to learn more about any of its specific efforts, JetBlue's provided details on the Soar With Reading program, its partnership with KaBOOM!, the JetBlue Foundation, environmental and social reporting, and so on. It breaks down all these initiatives really well with big headers, bullet points, pictures, and links to other web pages visitors can click to learn more. JetBlue also encourages visitors to volunteer or donate their TrueBlue points.</p> \n<h3>13. <a href=\"https://www.workday.com/en-us/company/about-workday/core-values.html\">Workday</a>: We aim for innovation not only in our development organization but also in the way we approach every aspect of our business.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/oHsgTu_MtbdcM2RPkNilhIbqcd6lPBflaECBWDQlp43SxCyoc19xXbK_fqBrhKzeHl0IU88JHsjMm-lgGQHUcijlHQoxOarLAmzd-sHLW8-2whhV5RLHGCevG4Zsc1Dr6eHvtAIK\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\" alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Workday\"></p> \n<p>Workday, a human resources (HR) task automation service, doesn't use its mission statement to highlight the features of its product or how it intends to help HR professionals improve in such-and-such a way.</p> \n<p>Instead, the business takes a stance on the state of enterprise software in general: There's a lot of great tech out there. But at Workday, it revolves around the people. We love how confident yet kind this mission statement is. It observes the state of its industry — which Workday believes lacks a human touch — and builds company values around it.</p> \n<h3>14. <a href=\"https://prezi.com/about/\">Prezi</a>: To reinvent how people share knowledge, tell stories, and inspire their audiences to act.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/_ZBzI0wxybj4V_WHVlHv3CxlMy11uylhObkz4IoVenC-SnIg3FWUQdmSa_t_rPvlpO86UFxwleYyl1C-Tb6cHxnl5xOzggBBGFgJ8JtCPE00JzrpCY-ouSRo4pCBYZrmDunAnNqj\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\" alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Prezi\"></p> \n<p>If you know Prezi, you know how engaging it can make your next business presentation look. According to its mission statement, the company's clever slide animations and three-dimensional experience aren't just superficial product features. With every decision Prezi makes, it's all about the story you tell and the audience that story affects.</p> \n<h3>15. <a href=\"https://www.tesla.com/about\">Tesla</a>: To accelerate the world's transition to sustainable energy.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202022-02-03%20at%204-03-33%20PM-png.png?width=650&amp;name=Screen%20Shot%202022-02-03%20at%204-03-33%20PM-png.png\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\" width=\"650\" alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Tesla\"></p> \n<p>A car company's punny use of the word \"accelerate\" is just one reason this mission statement sticks out. However, Tesla makes this list because of how its mission statement describes the industry.</p> \n<p>It may be a car company, but Tesla's primary interest isn't just automobiles — it's promoting sustainable energy. And, sustainable energy still has a \"long road\" ahead of it (pun intended) — hence the world's \"transition\" into this market.</p> \n<p>Ultimately, a mission statement that can admit to the industry's immaturity is exactly what gets customers to root for it — and Tesla does that nicely.</p> \n<h3>16. <a href=\"https://invisiblechildren.com/challenge/\">Invisible Children</a>: To end violence and exploitation facing our world's most isolated and vulnerable communities.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/KEEZh3wumIE2uUqJfcFZJlq7LG0iVo8iSh7xy1xd5NyRzww4r4mVbUCcxXXhgilzaf1a9CHeMXYwr0ZxYKC80KqGBo5aIOpnG4C5fZEzWHwWmPNIUPfzUj52f4HEeljzNMy-v4yt\" width=\"500\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 500px;\" alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: Invisible Children\"></p> \n<p>Invisible Children is a non-profit that raises awareness around the violence affecting communities across Central Africa, and the company takes quite a confident tone in its mission.</p> \n<p>The most valuable quality of this mission statement is that it has an end goal. Many companies' visions and missions are intentionally left open-ended so that the business might always be needed by the community. Invisible Children, on the other hand, wants to \"end\" the violence facing African families. It's an admirable mission that all businesses — not just nonprofits — can learn from when motivating customers.</p> \n<h3>17. <a href=\"https://www.ted.com/about/our-organization\">TED</a>: Spread ideas.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Missions Statement Examples: TED\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-48-30-PM.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-48-30-PM.jpeg\" title=\"TED\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></p> \n<p>We've all seen TED Talks online before. Well, the company happens to have one of the most concise mission statements out there.</p> \n<p>TED, which stands for \"Technology Education and Design,\" has a two-word mission statement that shines through in every Talk you've seen the company publish on the internet. That mission statement: \"Spread ideas.\" Sometimes, the best way to get an audience to remember you is to zoom out as far as your business's vision can go. What do you really care about? TED has recorded some of the most famous presentations globally, but in the grand scheme of things, all it wants is to spread ideas around to its viewers.</p> \n<p>Now that we’ve gone over successful mission statements, what does a good vision statement look like? Check out some of the following company vision statements — and get inspired to write one for your brand.</p> \n<a></a>\n<br> \n<h3>1. <a href=\"https://www.alz.org/about/strategic-plan\">Alzheimer's Association</a>: A world without Alzheimer's disease.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Vision Statement Examples: Alzheimer's Association\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-45-96-PM.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-45-96-PM.jpeg\" title=\"Alzheimer's Association logo\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></p> \n<p>The Alzheimer’s Association conducts global research and provides quality care and support to people with dementia. This vision statement looks into the future where people won’t have to battle this currently incurable disease. With the work that it's doing in the present, both employees and consumers can see how the organization achieves its vision by helping those in need.</p> \n<h3>2. <a href=\"https://www.teachforamerica.org/what-we-do/who-we-are\">Teach for America</a>: One day, all children in this nation will have the opportunity to attain an excellent education.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Vision Statement Examples: Teach for America\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-46-13-PM.jpeg?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-46-13-PM.jpeg\" title=\"Teach for America\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></p> \n<p>Teach for America creates a network of leaders to provide equal education opportunities to children in need. This organization’s day-to-day work includes helping marginalized students receive the proper education they otherwise wouldn’t have access to. Its vision statement is what it hopes to see through its efforts — a nation where no child is left behind.</p> \n<h3>3. <a href=\"https://creativecommons.org/about/\">Creative Commons</a>: Realizing the full potential of the internet — universal access to research and education, full participation in culture — to drive a new era of development, growth, and productivity.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/WIbXedRlasrnPpHXunhTz-6aIz6UjLJIeTpgRkhK0DD05v_4he9qZBn6aXtwdAAY5KLaQSqZaVjmxa7uGUjDJnxdrrNLzqyLnAU0pjCXGRPBOLQUrwdfKJDaSPBKIg0OZUvTvJcK\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\" alt=\"Best Vision Statement Examples: Creative Commons\"></p> \n<p>This nonprofit’s vision statement is broad. It helps overcome legal obstacles to share knowledge and creativity around the world. By working closely with major institutions, its vision is an innovative internet that isn’t barred by paywalls.</p> \n<h3>4. <a href=\"https://money.cnn.com/2015/04/05/technology/bill-gates-email-microsoft-40-anniversary/index.html\">Microsoft</a>: We strive to create local opportunity, growth, and impact in every country around the world.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Vision Statement Examples: Microsoft\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-48-93-PM.png?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-48-93-PM.png\" title=\"Microsoft\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></p> \n<p>Microsoft is one of the most well-known technology companies in the world. It makes gadgets for work, play, and creative purposes on a worldwide scale, and its vision statement reflects that. Through its product offering and pricing, it can provide technology to anyone who needs it.</p> \n<h3>5. <a href=\"https://www.health.gov.au/about-us/what-we-do\">Australia Department of Health</a>: Better health and wellbeing for all Australians, now and for future generations.</h3> \n<p><img alt=\"Best Vision Statement Examples: Australia Department of Health\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-50-63-PM.png?width=650&amp;name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-50-63-PM.png\" title=\"Australian Government Department of Health\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\"></p> \n<p>This government department has a clear vision for its country. Through health policies, programs, and regulations, it has the means to improve the healthcare of Australian citizens.</p> \n<h3>6. <a href=\"https://about.linkedin.com/\">LinkedIn</a>: Create economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://about.linkedin.com/etc.clientlibs/settings/wcm/designs/gandalf/clientlibs/resources/images/og-social-share-image.jpg\" alt=\"Best Vision Statement Examples: LinkedIn\"></p> \n<p>LinkedIn is a professional networking service that gives people the opportunity to seek employment. Its vision statement intends to provide employees of every level a chance to get the job they need.</p> \n<h3>7. <a href=\"https://www.thewaltdisneycompany.com/about/\">Disney</a>: To be one of the world's leading producers and providers of entertainment and information.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202022-02-03%20at%204-19-51%20PM-png.png\" alt=\"Best Vision Statement Examples: Disney\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center; font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"https://disneyworld.disney.go.com/\"><em>Image Source</em></a></p> \n<p>Disney’s vision statement goes beyond providing ordinary entertainment. It intends to tell stories and drive creativity that inspires future generations through its work. This is an exceptional vision statement because it goes beyond giving consumers programs to watch, but ones that excite and change the way people see them and the world around them.</p> \n<h3>8. <a href=\"https://about.facebook.com/company-info/\">Meta</a>: Give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together.</h3> \n<p><strong><img src=\"https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/zojsIJYigACjxsqwchb_EzIH6AJFbgHX3Gl2OGSDTjDtUu2D-rDBViqBUTs1XCfsNxErzNSzNtmfGDEx0MgSLsF-crZqtjJGCMwT0XvikDh6KY8tGxjvAkM1TnREOK2BELWR7ZHo\" width=\"624\" height=\"405\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block;\" alt=\"Best Vision Statement Examples: Meta\"></strong></p> \n<p>Meta, formerly known as Facebook, is a major social media platform with a concise vision statement. It provides a platform to stay in touch with loved ones and potentially connect to people around the world.</p> \n<h3>9. <a href=\"https://www.southwest.com/html/about-southwest/careers/culture.html#:~:text=Our%20Purpose%3A%20Connect%20people%20to,efficient%2C%20and%20most%20profitable%20airline.\">Southwest</a>: To be the world's most loved, most efficient, and most profitable airline.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/mMKKH4y1O9w93a4m2Edl8q0N4CeqvgJDzpz1nFUmXQSk1FA6w9qJrPSyjhmiNI4sgpCTdQE-S4sv_h8ShlpMZatJv-NcK5slL-0ITfXT5ciqZ-KNxignOrcQVeSMytMqC8xHox9q\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\" alt=\"Best Vision Statement Examples: Southwest\"></p> \n<p>Southwest Airlines is an international airline that strives to serve its flyers with a smile. Its vision statement is unique because it sees itself not just excelling in profit but outstanding customer service, too. Its vision is possible through its strategy and can lead its employees to be at the level they work toward.</p> \n<h3>10. <a href=\"https://www.dunkindonuts.com/en/about/about-us\">Dunkin'</a>: To be always the desired place for great coffee beverages and delicious complementary doughnuts &amp; bakery products to enjoy with family and friends.</h3> \n<p><img src=\"https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/YUCn_jvgoopVJd7n74CEopJ88A6atiABk787RGqP4akR8ljZN-md82QN7qfBAkcqvCHJYv-ZL-ugRW1OUHCF6ybscR3dtt_ClAC5sh1C4JfIbcf0VB0NJYlg8vpvt3ENO4DjIk4x\" width=\"650\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 650px;\" alt=\"Best Vision Statement Examples: Dunkin'\"></p> \n<p>Notice the interesting use of the word \"complementary\" in this vision statement. No, the chain isn't envisioning giving out freebies in the future. Its vision goes beyond remaining a large coffee chain. Rather, the brand wants to be the consummate leader in the coffee and donut industry. It wants to become a place known for fun, food, and recreation.</p> \n<h2>Inspire Through Brand Values</h2> \n<p>Brand values play a much more significant role in customer loyalty than you think. Showing that your business understands its audience — and can appeal to them on an emotional level — could be the decision point for a customer’s next purchase. We hope you found some insight in this post that can help you brainstorm your inspiring vision and mission statements for your business.</p> \n<p><em>Editor's note: This post was originally published in August 2014 and has been updated for comprehensiveness.</em></p> \n<p><a class=\"cta_button\" g%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-45-18-PM.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn71@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-26-55-105_675f5711c8851e07.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-47-32-PM.jpeg?width=650&name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-47-32-PM.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn36@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-26-52-321_b0f6ce42153cf016.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-46-81-PM.jpeg?width=650&name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-46-81-PM.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn56@2020_4/2022/03/14/08-26-54-635_cd33fc5f8f1f1b7f.webp","https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/oHsgTu_MtbdcM2RPkNilhIbqcd6lPBflaECBWDQlp43SxCyoc19xXbK_fqBrhKzeHl0IU88JHsjMm-lgGQHUcijlHQoxOarLAmzd-sHLW8-2whhV5RLHGCevG4Zsc1Dr6eHvtAIK":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn95@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-26-56-074_26351e138b2b91d3.webp","https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/_ZBzI0wxybj4V_WHVlHv3CxlMy11uylhObkz4IoVenC-SnIg3FWUQdmSa_t_rPvlpO86UFxwleYyl1C-Tb6cHxnl5xOzggBBGFgJ8JtCPE00JzrpCY-ouSRo4pCBYZrmDunAnNqj":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn31@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-26-53-190_86d421e067b960ba.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202022-02-03%20at%204-03-33%20PM-png.png?width=650&name=Screen%20Shot%202022-02-03%20at%204-03-33%20PM-png.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn6@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-26-50-201_e73e2fef09ed5323.webp","https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/KEEZh3wumIE2uUqJfcFZJlq7LG0iVo8iSh7xy1xd5NyRzww4r4mVbUCcxXXhgilzaf1a9CHeMXYwr0ZxYKC80KqGBo5aIOpnG4C5fZEzWHwWmPNIUPfzUj52f4HEeljzNMy-v4yt":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn4@2020_6/2022/03/14/08-26-49-794_7a18bb0dd672ea5a.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-48-30-PM.jpeg?width=650&name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-48-30-PM.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn71@2020_6/2022/03/14/08-26-55-746_334880052b525c20.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-45-96-PM.jpeg?width=650&name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-45-96-PM.jpeg":null,"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-46-13-PM.jpeg?width=650&name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-46-13-PM.jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn91@2020_4/2022/03/14/08-26-54-042_d66ed66bea4ec16b.webp","https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/WIbXedRlasrnPpHXunhTz-6aIz6UjLJIeTpgRkhK0DD05v_4he9qZBn6aXtwdAAY5KLaQSqZaVjmxa7uGUjDJnxdrrNLzqyLnAU0pjCXGRPBOLQUrwdfKJDaSPBKIg0OZUvTvJcK":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn75@2020_6/2022/03/14/08-26-50-845_1a2e9855da80bdd7.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-48-93-PM.png?width=650&name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-48-93-PM.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn9@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-26-49-488_d9ca6e634e9c97fa.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-50-63-PM.png?width=650&name=27%20Truly%20Inspiring%20Company%20Vision%20and%20Mission%20Statement%20Examples-Feb-03-2022-08-53-50-63-PM.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn70@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-26-50-022_dd5afe62c677dbdb.webp","https://about.linkedin.com/etc.clientlibs/settings/wcm/designs/gandalf/clientlibs/resources/images/og-social-share-image.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn58@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-26-51-321_f100fe062155391b.webp","https://blog.hubspot.com/hubfs/Screen%20Shot%202022-02-03%20at%204-19-51%20PM-png.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn12@2020_5/2022/03/14/08-26-51-277_341752e848c753d3.webp","https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/zojsIJYigACjxsqwchb_EzIH6AJFbgHX3Gl2OGSDTjDtUu2D-rDBViqBUTs1XCfsNxErzNSzNtmfGDEx0MgSLsF-crZqtjJGCMwT0XvikDh6KY8tGxjvAkM1TnREOK2BELWR7ZHo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn75@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-26-57-356_18f7971b64b2d64c.webp","https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/mMKKH4y1O9w93a4m2Edl8q0N4CeqvgJDzpz1nFUmXQSk1FA6w9qJrPSyjhmiNI4sgpCTdQE-S4sv_h8ShlpMZatJv-NcK5slL-0ITfXT5ciqZ-KNxignOrcQVeSMytMqC8xHox9q":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn76@2020_1/2022/03/14/08-26-55-297_f4cdcf0c36be51df.webp","https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/YUCn_jvgoopVJd7n74CEopJ88A6atiABk787RGqP4akR8ljZN-md82QN7qfBAkcqvCHJYv-ZL-ugRW1OUHCF6ybscR3dtt_ClAC5sh1C4JfIbcf0VB0NJYlg8vpvt3ENO4DjIk4x":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn28@2020_2/2022/03/14/08-26-53-879_4a99e61d9abbfc9b.webp","https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/9dbb6b2a-959e-401f-b57b-e77d3b99e9c8.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn63@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-26-53-256_f134fd4b7561102c.webp","https://track.hubspot.com/__ptq.gif?a=53&k=14&r=https%3A%2F%2Fblog.hubspot.com%2Fmarketing%2Finspiring-company-mission-statements&bu=https%253A%252F%252Fblog.hubspot.com%252Fmarketing&bvt=rss":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn94@2020_3/2022/03/14/08-26-52-151_fa4d282dc74c1321.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1647246408229},{"createdTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:48","updatedTime":"2022-03-14 16:26:48","title":"What is a Media Mix & The Most Effective Types [HubSpot Blog Data]","link":"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/media-mix","description":"<p>I’m willing to bet that today, the typical campaign at any brand uses a media mix.</p>  \n<p>This refers to the process of using multiple channels to meet marketing goals. The question is, how exactly does it help brands better plan campaigns?</p> \n<p><a class=\"cta_button\" href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/cs/ci/?pg=a145a75e-59f6-4b51-a482-4f3ea486e740&amp;pid=53&amp;ecid=&amp;hseid=&amp;hsic=\"><img class=\"hs-cta-img \" style=\"border-width: 0px; /*hs-extra-styles*/; margin: 0 auto; display: block; margin-top: 20px; margin-bottom: 20px\" alt=\"Free Resource: Content Marketing Planning Template\" src=\"https://no-cache.hubspot.com/cta/default/53/a145a75e-59f6-4b51-a482-4f3ea486e740.png\" align=\"middle\"></a></p> \n<p>Let’s dive into how it works, review some stats, and see some brand examples.</p> \n<p></p> \n<p>A media mix is another term for an overview of the channels businesses choose to execute their marketing strategies on. Ultimately, media mix optimization is the process of analyzing the performance of those channels.</p> \n<p>Think about the last campaign you saw from one of your favorite brands. What did they do differently that really clicked with you? By incorporating a media mix into your yearly planning, you can narrow down what resonates with your audience.</p> \n<h2>Media Mix Example</h2> \n<p>To see how a media mix works for a campaign, let’s use makeup brand <a href=\"https://thelipbar.com/\">The Lip Bar</a>’s latest campaign: \"Something BAWSE is coming.\"</p> \n<p>To build anticipation around its latest product launch and celebrate its 10-year company anniversary, The Lip Bar launched a multi-channel campaign that reached audiences both online and offline.</p> \n<p>First up, website.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"media mix example showing makeup brand's campaign on their website\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/What%20is%20a%20Media%20Mix%20%26%20The%20Most%20Effective%20Types%20%5BHubSpot%20Blog%20Data%5D-1.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=What%20is%20a%20Media%20Mix%20%26%20The%20Most%20Effective%20Types%20%5BHubSpot%20Blog%20Data%5D-1.jpeg\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center; font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"https://thelipbar.com/\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p>When you land on the brand’s homepage, you’ll see an image of the CEO with the following sentence \"Shark Tank said no, 12,000 5-star reviews later, 100% that bawse.\"</p> \n<p>Upon clicking on the image, you’ll arrive at a landing page that has a timeline of the brand. From launching in 2012, to opening its flagship store in 2019, then expanding to 1500+ stores in 2021. Once you get to 2022, you see the tagline \"Something Bawse is Coming.\"</p> \n<p>As you continue scrolling, you reach a section that offers a launch date and time for the brand’s newest product.</p> \n<p>The second digital channel the brand leveraged for this campaign is YouTube, publishing a 45-second video showing the CEO’s journey over the last 10 years.</p> \n<div class=\"hs-responsive-embed-wrapper hs-responsive-embed\" style=\"width: 100%; height: auto; position: relative; overflow: hidden; padding: 0; max-width: 853px; max-height: 480px; min-width: 256px; margin: 0px auto; display: block;\"> \n <div class=\"hs-responsive-embed-inner-wrapper\" style=\"position: relative; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; padding-bottom: 56.27%; margin: 0;\">\n  <iframe class=\"hs-responsive-embed-iframe\" style=\"position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border: none;\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0BfxeqsaYLE\" width=\"853\" height=\"480\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe>\n </div> \n</div> \n<p>Moving offline, the brand also published billboards in five cities to continue the campaign.</p> \n<p>Note how the billboard didn’t use the tagline we saw on social media platforms.</p> \n<p><img alt=\"media mix example showing makeup brand's billboard campaign\" src=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/hs-fs/hubfs/Google%20Drive%20Integration/What%20is%20a%20Media%20Mix%20%26%20The%20Most%20Effective%20Types%20%5BHubSpot%20Blog%20Data%5D.jpeg?width=600&amp;name=What%20is%20a%20Media%20Mix%20%26%20The%20Most%20Effective%20Types%20%5BHubSpot%20Blog%20Data%5D.jpeg\" title=\"\" width=\"600\" style=\"margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; display: block; width: 600px;\"></p> \n<p style=\"text-align: center; font-size: 12px;\"><a href=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/CZwiA_ILpBj/\">Image Source</a></p> \n<p>The benefit of using a media mix is to leverage different strategies to see which tactics work and lead to better conversions.</p> \n<p>The Lip Bar’s latest campaign is a great example of how any brand can leverage channels differently to reach the same marketing goal.</p> \n<h2>Media Mix Stats in 2022</h2> \n<p>In January 2022, we surveyed over 600 <a href=\"https://blog.hubspot.com/marketing/media-planning\">media planners</a> to discover their strategies, goals, and challenges. Here are some interesting findings:</p> \n<ul> \n <li>84% of media planners surveyed leverage a mix of organic and paid media.</li> \n <li>Email marketing is the most leveraged media channel, used by 1 in 2 media planners.</li> \n <li>41% of media planners surveyed will change their media mix in 2022, while 45% will keep it the same.</li> \n <li>14% of media planners currently leverage non-fungible tokens (NFTs) while 16% plan to use them for the first time in 2022.</li> \n <li>39% of those who use NFTs in their media planning say they have the best ROI of any channel in their media mix.</li> \n <li>39% of marketers surveyed say determining the most effective media mix is the biggest challenge of media planning.</li> \n</ul> \n<h2>Media Mix Optimization</h2> \n<p>Media mix optimization provides businesses with an understanding of how their messages are coming across to customers. It allows a brand to invest more time and money into marketing strategies that are best suited for their audiences.</p> \n<p>Marketers might consider optimizing their media mix if they want to gain some helpful insight into what time and capital is needed to target their audience in a way that gives customers a personalized experience.</p> \n<p>But, while media mix optimization is a powerful opportunity for methodizing data collection online, it's not the best strategy for marketers who employ a lot of traditional marketing techniques, since you can't really measure the success of a billboard or newspaper ad.</p> \n<p>However, to make guided decisions such as what font to use in creative design, when to publish social media posts on various channels, or where to invest resources, this method can be helpful.</p> \n<p>Optimizing a media mix means looking at the analytics and ROI of various marketing strategies. This can be anything from engagement data of social media platforms to views on the newest commercial.</p> \n<p>That's where media mix modeling comes in. If media mix optimization is the \"what,\" modeling is the \"how.\" Every model can (and should) look different, depending on your marketing and broader business goal.</p> \n<p></p> \n<p>Media mix models can be used to analyze the relationship between a dependent variable and an independent variable.</p> \n<p>For instance, let's say a business has a question like, \"How did paying for a sponsored tweet affect overall blog traffic?\" The business's media mix model should then accurately depict how a dependent variable – like overall blog traffic – relates to an independent variable, such as investing in Twitter.</p> \n<p>For businesses still deciding if a media mix optimization is a good idea for them, we've put together key tips to guide you when creating a media mix model. Let's explore those, next.</p> \n<h2>Tips for Optimizing Your Media Mix</h2> \n<h3>1. Collect personal level data.</h3> \n<p>The goal here is to find and focus on analytics that will help provide an accurate picture of how customers engage with your media mix.</p> \n<p>Analytics software is expansive and offers an array of tools for use. If you're in the market for one, the <a href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/products/marketing\">HubSpot Marketing Hub</a> is a great place to go.</p> \n<p>Having too many metrics can be confusing and lead to inaccurate data. The best plan is to have an idea of which metrics need to be tracked so they can be right at the beginning.</p> \n<p>A normal media mix optimization process can take anywhere from a few months to a year. So, collecting the right information at the beginning contributes to getting the most accurate information overall.</p> \n<h3>2. Have a robust reporting process.</h3> \n<p>When using a media mix, you often combine online and offline strategies. With this in mind, it can be more difficult to measure the impact of a billboard compared to a paid social ad.</p> \n<p>That means you’ll have to think outside of the box when evaluating your media mix. For instance, while an online ad will have clear conversion rates you can find, a billboard may require some creative tracking.</p> \n<p>Perhaps, you can track the uptick in branded search volume or improved brand recall.</p> \n<p>This requires having a robust reporting process that accounts for the events you’ll be tracking – both online and offline.</p> \n<h3>3. Choose the right platform.</h3> \n<p>Marketing teams that use CMS or analytics software are already ahead of the game. Software like this is essential to optimizing a media mix because it can give you numbers that would otherwise take some time to figure out manually.</p> \n<p>A brand can analyze its media mix with the use of platforms that collect engagement data in real-time and compile that data into tracking reports.</p> \n<p>Look for a platform that can give a holistic view of results across the board, so results will maintain consistency. It's also good to choose software that specializes in the marketing channels being used at the time.</p> \n<p>Because optimizing is measuring a lot of different data at once, stick to as few systems as possible.</p> \n<p>For businesses that are in the market for a CMS,<a href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/products/marketing/content-management-system?_ga=2.32061246.1093091538.1581343599-940436819.1565181751\"> </a><a href=\"https://www.hubspot.com/products/marketing/content-management-system?_ga=2.32061246.1093091538.1581343599-940436819.1565181751\">HubSpot offers tools</a> that are easy to use for brands of any size.</p> \n<h3>4. Analyze the data.</h3> \n<p>We've been talking a lot about the kind of data and analyzing that needs to be done in a media mix optimization, but another important factor is being able to interpret and understand that data.</p> \n<p>It's no secret that in the marketing world, there is an abundance of processes and acronyms floating around. While first getting into the groove of understanding them and what they mean can be intimidating, it's important to know the data being collected and how to use it to your advantage.</p> \n<p>For instance, if a marketing team had especially high click-to-open rates for weekly newsletters, that's useful information to infer that the next campaign could benefit greatly from an email-marketing rollout. Alternatively, if a marketing team has no idea what a click-to-open rate is, those numbers aren't going to be helpful — just a little confusing.</p> \n<p>Reading data to understand its usefulness is just as important as collecting it.</p> \n<h3>5. Consider public perception.</h3> \n<p>Knowing how the public perceives your brand can help fill in some interpretation gaps during the modeling process. In the media mix model, think about how to fit in customer opinion. That way, the numbers will have some customer opinions to define them.</p> \n<p>There are a couple of ways to do this.</p> \n<p>To better understand your brand perception, monitor your brand mentions on social media. Take note of the positives, the negatives, and the questions. You can also create a survey to know how your customers feel about your company and its services and use a net promoter score.</p> \n<p>An NPS asks customers how likely they are to recommend a business to a friend. Knowing this will aid in figuring out how a business fares among the competition in the market. It will also assist in future marketing endeavors.</p> \n<p>For instance, if customers fill out your survey and ask for more personalized Instagram stories, your team could take that knowledge and include it in your next campaign.</p> \n<p>This method ultimately gives the media mix optimization reigns to the customer.</p> \n<p>Media mix optimization can help your marketing team figure out which distribution channels will best promote an upcoming campaign, and can ultimately help strengthen your marketing strategy as a whole.</p> \n<p><em>Editor's Note: This post was originally published in Feb. 2020 and has been updated for comprehensiveness. </em></p> \n<p><a class=\"cta_button\"
